parts.name: Picture description
parts.title: For each question, you will see a picture and you will hear four short statements. The statements will be spoken just one time. They will not be printed in your test book so you must listen carefully to understand what the speaker says. When you hear the four statements, look at the picture and choose the statement that best describes what you see in the picture. Choose the best answer A, B, C or D

intro.title:
EXAMPLE:
Now listen to the four statements.
Statement (D) best describes what you see in the picture.
Therefore, you should choose answer (D).
intro.answers: ["A. He is on the phone","B. She is driving the car","C. She is typing on the computer","D. He is sitting next to her"]

questions.text_audio:

B. He's sweeping a floor
C. He's fixing a light
D. He's holding some clothes

parts.name: Question - response
parts.title: In this part of the test, you will hear a question or statement spoken in English, followed by three responses, also spoken in English. The question or statement and the responses will be spoken just one time. They will not be printed in your test book, so you must listen carefully. You are to choose the best response to each question or statement.

intro.title:
You will hear:
Why are you late?
intro.answers: ["A. I hope I won't be","B. My car broke down","C. He alway is"]
intro.explains: The best response is choice B. "My car broke down". Therefore, you should choose B.

questions.text_audio:
When does the shop close?
A. Yes, at the workshop
B. No, they're new clothes
C. At nine o'clock tonight
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Khi nào thì c\u1eeda hàng \u0111óng c\u1eeda?<\/p>

A. Có, t\u1ea1i h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o<\/p>

B. Không, \u0111ó là qu\u1ea7n áo m\u1edbi<\/p>

C. Vào lúc chín gi\u1edd t\u1ed1i nay<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Khi n\u00e0o th\u00ec c\u1eeda h\u00e0ng \u0111\u00f3ng c\u1eeda? C. V\u00e0o l\u00fac ch\u00edn gi\u1edd t\u1ed1i nay.","en":null}

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Ai c\u00f3 l\u1ecbch d\u1ecdn d\u1eb9p nh\u00e0 b\u1ebfp? C. Jack","en":null}

C. \u0110ó s\u1ebd là t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 m\u1ecdi th\u1ee9 à?<\/p>"}

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Anh bi\u1ebft ai \u0111\u00e3 y\u00eau c\u1ea7u h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt kh\u00f4ng?  A. Xin l\u1ed7i, t\u00f4i v\u1eeba m\u1edbi v\u00e0o v\u0103n ph\u00f2ng.","en":null}

questions.text_audio:

Ali s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn b\u1eefa ti\u1ec7c v\u1ec1 h\u01b0u c\u1ee7a Jessica, ph\u1ea3i không?<\/p>

A. Tôi không ngh\u0129 h\u1ecd \u0111ã làm vi\u1ec7c cùng nhau<\/p>

B. L\u1ed1p xe m\u1edbi toanh<\/p>

C. Không, c\u1ea3m \u01a1n, tôi \u0111ã \u0103n r\u1ed3i<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Ali s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn b\u1eefa ti\u1ec7c v\u1ec1 h\u01b0u c\u1ee7a Jessica, ph\u1ea3i kh\u00f4ng?  A. T\u00f4i kh\u00f4ng ngh\u0129 h\u1ecd \u0111\u00e3 l\u00e0m vi\u1ec7c c\u00f9ng nhau."}

questions.text_audio:
Why don't you go to the trade show with Franklin and Jane?
A. No, I didn't see it
B. Because I have a major report to finalize that week
C. Usually in San Francisco
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao anh không \u0111\u1ebfn bu\u1ed5i tri\u1ec3n lãm th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i v\u1edbi Franklin và Jane?<\/p>

A. Không, tôi không th\u1ea5y nó<\/p>

B. Vì tôi c\u1ea7n hoàn thành m\u1ed9t b\u1ea3n báo cáo quan tr\u1ecdng vào tu\u1ea7n \u0111ó<\/p>

C. Th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên \u1edf San Francisco<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"T\u1ea1i sao anh kh\u00f4ng \u0111\u1ebfn bu\u1ed5i tri\u1ec3n l\u00e3m th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i v\u1edbi Franklin v\u00e0 Jane B. V\u00ec t\u00f4i c\u1ea7n ho\u00e0n th\u00e0nh m\u1ed9t b\u1ea3n b\u00e1o c\u00e1o quan tr\u1ecdng v\u00e0o tu\u1ea7n \u0111\u00f3.","en":null}

questions.text_audio:

B. It's close to the post office
C. We've got extras in the cabinet
questions.text_audio_trans:

A. K\u1ebft qu\u1ea3 ki\u1ec3m tra m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t<\/p>

C. Chúng tôi có các g\u0103ng tay b\u1ed5 sung \u1edf trong t\u1ee7<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Ch\u00fang ta s\u1ebd \u0111\u1eb7t th\u00eam g\u0103ng tay cho ph\u00f2ng th\u00ed nghi\u1ec7m khi n\u00e0o? C. Ch\u00fang t\u00f4i c\u00f3 c\u00e1c g\u0103ng tay b\u1ed5 sung \u1edf trong t\u1ee7."}

questions.text_audio:
Doesn't this movie theater seat 500 people?
A. Tickets are fifteen dollars

C. We should be finished soon

A. Vé xem h\u1ebft m\u01b0\u1eddi l\u0103m \u0111ô la<\/p>

C. Chúng ta nên xong vi\u1ec7c s\u1edbm<\/p>"}

childrens.explains: {"vn":"R\u1ea1p chi\u1ebfu phim n\u00e0y kh\u00f4ng \u0111\u1ee7 ch\u1ed7 ng\u1ed3i cho 500 ng\u01b0\u1eddi sao? B. Kh\u00f4ng ho\u00e0n to\u00e0n nh\u01b0 v\u1eady, kh\u00f4ng."}

A. Ti\u1ec7c tr\u01b0a c\u1ee7a khách hàng<\/p>

B. Tôi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c lên l\u1ecbch vào ngày m\u01b0\u1eddi b\u1ed1n<\/p>

questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Anh c\u00f3 mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u1eb7t l\u1ecbch h\u1eb9n v\u1edbi b\u00e1c s\u0129 dinh d\u01b0\u1ee1ng kh\u00f4ng? B. T\u00f4i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u00ean l\u1ecbch v\u00e0o ng\u00e0y m\u01b0\u1eddi b\u1ed1n."}

questions.text_audio:

parts.name: Short conversations
parts.title: You will hear some conversations between two people. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speakers say in each conversation. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet. The conversations will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

questions.text_audio:
M-Au: I just got a call from Mr. Benson, the owner at 488 Oak Street, where we're doing that big interior renovation. He was a little upset. He says the wrong color countertop has been installed in his kitchen.

W-Am: That's strange. I placed the order for that countertop myself. It was white marble, if I remember correctly. I'd better order a replacement immediately.

M-Au: OK. I'll call Mr. Benson back and let him know we're ordering him a new one right away.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Tôi v\u1eeba nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cu\u1ed9c g\u1ecdi t\u1eeb ông Benson, ng\u01b0\u1eddi ch\u1ee7 \u1edf 488 Oak Street, ch\u1ed7 chúng ta \u0111ang ti\u1ebfn hành trùng tu n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t l\u1edbn \u0111ó. Ông \u1ea5y h\u01a1i khó ch\u1ecbu. Ông \u1ea5y nói r\u1eb1ng m\u1eb7t bàn b\u1ebfp không \u0111úng màu \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t trong b\u1ebfp nhà ông \u1ea5y.<\/p>

W-Am: L\u1ea1 th\u1eadt. Tôi \u0111ã t\u1ef1 \u0111\u1eb7t m\u1eb7t bàn b\u1ebfp \u0111ó mà. N\u1ebfu tôi nh\u1edb không nh\u1ea7m thì \u0111ó là \u0111á c\u1ea9m th\u1ea1ch tr\u1eafng. T\u1ed1t h\u01a1n là tôi nên \u0111\u1eb7t thay th\u1ebf ngay l\u1eadp t\u1ee9c.<\/p>

M-Au: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c. Tôi s\u1ebd g\u1ecdi l\u1ea1i cho ông Benson và cho ông \u1ea5y bi\u1ebft là chúng ta s\u1ebd \u0111\u1eb7t cho ông \u1ea5y m\u1ed9t cái m\u1edbi ngay l\u1eadp t\u1ee9c.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Hi, Lucia. I think we're almost ready for the cooking class tomorrow. We have a lot of people signed up, even though it's the first one we've held here at the store.

W-Br: I know. I really hope this will help boost our sales. The chef teaching the class will be using a lot of the equipment we sell here in the store, so hopefully the students will buy it to use at home.

M-Cn: Yes, you're right. Oh, that reminds me. We got a shipment of new cookware this morning. I'll go put everything on the shelves now.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Chào, Lucia. Tôi ngh\u0129 chúng ta g\u1ea7n nh\u01b0 \u0111ã s\u1eb5n sàng cho l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc n\u1ea5u \u0103n vào ngày mai. Chúng ta có r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u0103ng ký, dù \u0111ây là l\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea7u tiên chúng tôi t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c \u1edf \u0111ây t\u1ea1i c\u1eeda hàng này.<\/p>

W-Br: Tôi bi\u1ebft. Tôi th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 hy v\u1ecdng vi\u1ec7c này s\u1ebd giúp thúc \u0111\u1ea9y doanh s\u1ed1 bán hàng c\u1ee7a chúng ta. \u0110\u1ea7u b\u1ebfp gi\u1ea3ng d\u1ea1y l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc s\u1ebd s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb chúng ta bán \u1edf \u0111ây t\u1ea1i c\u1eeda hàng này, vì v\u1eady hy v\u1ecdng các h\u1ecdc viên s\u1ebd mua nó \u0111\u1ec3 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng \u1edf nhà.<\/p>

M-Cn: Cô nói \u0111úng. \u1ed2, \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó làm tôi nh\u1edb. Chúng ta có m\u1ed9t lô hàng d\u1ee5ng c\u1ee5 n\u1ea5u \u0103n m\u1edbi vào sáng nay. Tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u1eb7t m\u1ecdi th\u1ee9 lên k\u1ec7 ngay bây gi\u1edd.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Dave, have you had a chance to meet Yanmei Li, the new head of marketing, yet?

M-Cn: No, I haven't had time. I was busy with the launch of our new smartphone last week. Have you met her?

W-Am: Yeah, she seems very approachable. Her last job was with a computer manufacturer, so I think she's a really good fit for the company. So, how did the new product launch go?

M-Cn: Really well. We started in Europe and we'II expand to North America. I'm actually going there next week.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Dave, b\u1ea1n \u0111ã có c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i g\u1eb7p Yanmei Li, giám \u0111\u1ed1c marketing m\u1edbi ch\u01b0a?<\/p>

M-Cn: Không, tôi không có th\u1eddi gian. Tôi \u0111ã b\u1eadn r\u1ed9n v\u1edbi vi\u1ec7c ra m\u1eaft \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i thông minh m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a chúng tôi vào tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc. B\u1ea1n \u0111ã g\u1eb7p cô \u1ea5y ch\u01b0a?<\/p>

W-Am: Vâng, cô \u1ea5y có v\u1ebb r\u1ea5t d\u1ec5 g\u1ea7n. Công vi\u1ec7c cu\u1ed1i cùng c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y là v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t nhà s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t máy tính, vì v\u1eady tôi ngh\u0129 cô \u1ea5y th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 phù h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi công ty. V\u1eady, bu\u1ed5i ra m\u1eaft s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m m\u1edbi di\u1ec5n ra nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào?<\/p>

M-Cn: Th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 t\u1ed1t. Chúng ta b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u \u1edf châu Âu và s\u1ebd m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng sang B\u1eafc M\u1ef9. Tôi th\u1eadm chí s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111ó vào tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Hi, Jin-Sung. Oh, I was wondering... have you noticed how cold it's been here in the coffee shop lately?

M-Cn: Actually, yes. I wonder if it's because the side door hasn't been closing properly that door should close automatically. Maybe a hinge is broken or needs to be adjusted.

W-Br: Well, I'm really concerned about the temperature. Our customers don't want to sit in a cold coffee shop! I'll try to get a repair person to come and fix it today.

M-Cn: Actually... you don't need to call. I used to work at a hardware store.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Xin chào, Jin-Sung. \u1ed2, tôi \u0111ang t\u1ef1 h\u1ecfi ... b\u1ea1n có \u0111\u1ec3 ý th\u1ea5y d\u1ea1o này \u1edf quán cà phê l\u1ea1nh th\u1ebf nào không?<\/p>

M-Cn: Th\u1ef1c ra là có. Không bi\u1ebft có ph\u1ea3i vì cánh c\u1eeda bên hông \u0111óng \u0111úng cách mà cánh c\u1eeda t\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed9ng \u0111óng l\u1ea1i không. Có th\u1ec3 m\u1ed9t b\u1ea3n l\u1ec1 b\u1ecb h\u1ecfng ho\u1eb7c c\u1ea7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111i\u1ec1u ch\u1ec9nh.<\/p>

W-Br: Chà, tôi th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 lo v\u1ec1 nhi\u1ec7t \u0111\u1ed9. Khách hàng c\u1ee7a chúng ta không mu\u1ed1n ng\u1ed3i trong m\u1ed9t quán cà phê l\u1ea1nh! Tôi s\u1ebd c\u1ed1 g\u1eafng g\u1ecdi m\u1ed9t th\u1ee3 s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa \u0111\u1ebfn và s\u1eeda nó ngay hôm nay.<\/p>

M-Cn: Th\u1ef1c ra thì ... cô không c\u1ea7n g\u1ecdi \u0111âu. Tôi \u0111ã t\u1eebng làm vi\u1ec7c t\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t c\u1eeda hàng kim khí.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does the man imply when he says, "I used to work at a hardware store"?
childrens.answers: ["He can fix a problem.","He has experience in customer service.","He is not interested in an offer.","He is excited about teaching a new course."]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông ng\u1ee5 ý \u0111i\u1ec1u gì khi anh ta nói, Tôi t\u1eebng làm vi\u1ec7c \u1edf m\u1ed9t c\u1eeda hàng kim khí?<\/p>

A. Anh \u1ea5y có th\u1ec3 s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa.<\/p>

B. Anh \u1ea5y có kinh nghi\u1ec7m làm d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 khách hàng.<\/p>

C. Anh \u1ea5y không quan tâm \u0111\u1ebfn l\u1eddi \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb.<\/p>

D. Anh \u1ea5y r\u1ea5t hào h\u1ee9ng v\u1edbi vi\u1ec7c gi\u1ea3ng d\u1ea1y m\u1ed9t khóa h\u1ecdc m\u1edbi.<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó, ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef nói:<\/p>

“I'll try to get a repair person to come and fix it today.” <\/p>","en":"

What does the man imply when he says, I used to work at a hardware store?                <\/p>

A. He can fix a problem.<\/p>

B. He has experience in customer service.<\/p>

C. He is not interested in an offer.<\/p>

D. He is excited about teaching a new course.<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

The woman said earlier:<\/p>

“I'll try to get a repair person to come and fix it today.”<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Hi. I saw an advertisement for the Piceasy camera in today's newspaper, but the price shown on the display here in your store is different than what was listed in the ad.

M-Au: Oh... OK. My manager here can help you. Mr. Jensen?

M-Cn: Sure. Sorry about the confusion. That camera just went on sale today, and we haven't changed the price on our display yet.

W-Br: Oh, that's good to hear. I'd like to buy it then.

M-Cn: Great. And that camera comes with a two-year warranty, but for another 25 dollars, you can extend it to five years. Would you like to do that?
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Xin chào. Tôi th\u1ea5y qu\u1ea3ng cáo máy \u1ea3nh Piceasy trên báo ngày hôm nay, nh\u01b0ng giá \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tr\u01b0ng bày \u1edf \u0111ây t\u1ea1i c\u1eeda hàng c\u1ee7a anh khác v\u1edbi giá \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c niêm y\u1ebft trong qu\u1ea3ng cáo.<\/p>

M-Au: V\u1eady ... \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i. Qu\u1ea3n lý c\u1ee7a tôi \u1edf \u0111ây có th\u1ec3 h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 cô. Ông Jensen?<\/p>

M-Cn: Ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i. Xin l\u1ed7i v\u1ec1 s\u1ef1 nh\u1ea7m l\u1eabn này. Máy \u1ea3nh \u0111ó v\u1eeba \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bán vào ngày hôm nay và chúng tôi v\u1eabn ch\u01b0a thay \u0111\u1ed5i giá tr\u01b0ng bày.<\/p>

W-Br: \u1ed2, v\u1eady thì t\u1ed1t. Th\u1ebf tôi mu\u1ed1n mua nó.<\/p>

M-Cn: Tuy\u1ec7t. Chi\u1ebfc máy \u1ea3nh \u0111ó \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ea3o hành hai n\u0103m, nh\u01b0ng thêm 25 \u0111ô la, cô có th\u1ec3 kéo dài th\u1eddi gian b\u1ea3o hành lên n\u0103m n\u0103m. Cô có mu\u1ed1n không?<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: OK, I've finished examining your teeth. Everything looks healthy. Do you have any concerns?

W-Br: Yes, actually. It's nothing serious, but sometimes my teeth hurt a little when I brush them.

M-Cn: Maybe you're brushing too hard or you're using the wrong type of toothbrush. I have a pamphlet about that... uh, here you go. This has some useful recommendations.

W-Br: Thanks, I'll read it. And by the way, I recently moved, so I need to update my patient file.

M-Cn: OK, please give your new address to our receptionist on your way out.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, tôi \u0111ã khám r\u0103ng xong cho cô. T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 \u0111\u1ec1u trông ch\u1eafc kh\u1ecf. Cô còn v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 gì không?<\/p>

W-Br: Th\u1ef1c ra là có. Không có v\u1ebb gì nghiêm tr\u1ecdng, nh\u01b0ng \u0111ôi khi r\u0103ng tôi h\u01a1i \u0111au khi \u0111ánh r\u0103ng.<\/p>

M-Cn: Có th\u1ec3 cô \u0111ánh r\u0103ng quá m\u1ea1nh ho\u1eb7c cô dùng không \u0111úng lo\u1ea1i bàn ch\u1ea3i \u0111ánh r\u0103ng. Tôi có m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed1n sách nh\u1ecf v\u1ec1 v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 \u0111ó ... uh, c\u1ee7a cô \u0111ây. Trong \u0111ây có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 l\u1eddi khuyên h\u1eefu ích.<\/p>

W-Br: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n, tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ecdc nó. Và nhân ti\u1ec7n, tôi g\u1ea7n \u0111ây \u0111ã chuy\u1ec3n nhà, vì v\u1eady tôi c\u1ea7n c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt h\u1ed3 s\u01a1 b\u1ec7nh nhân c\u1ee7a mình.<\/p>

M-Cn: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c, vui lòng cung c\u1ea5p \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a cô cho nhân viên l\u1ec5 tân c\u1ee7a chúng tôi lúc ra ngoài nhé.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Hi, Charlie. This is Cora from Thomasville Marketing. We're impressed with your qualifications, and we'd like to offer you the position at our Chicago office.

M-Au: Thank you. That's exciting news. Moving to Chicago would be a big decision for me, though, so I'll need to think about it.

W-Am: Well, we'd really like to fill the position this week.

M-Au: OK, I understand.

W-Am: If you accept the position, we'd like you to come to Chicago soon to meet the team you'd be working with. And, of course, Thomasville Marketing always pays for business-related air travel and taxi expenses.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Chào Charlie. \u0110ây là Cora t\u1eeb Ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb Thomasville. Chúng tôi r\u1ea5t \u1ea5n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng v\u1edbi trình \u0111\u1ed9 chuyên môn c\u1ee7a anh và chúng tôi mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb anh m\u1ed9t v\u1ecb trí t\u1ea1i v\u0103n phòng Chicago c\u1ee7a chúng tôi.<\/p>

M-Au: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n. \u0110úng là tin vui. Tuy nhiên, chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ebfn Chicago là m\u1ed9t quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh l\u1edbn \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi tôi, vì v\u1eady tôi s\u1ebd c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i suy ngh\u0129 v\u1ec1 v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 này.<\/p>

W-Am: Chà, chúng tôi th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 mu\u1ed1n l\u1ea5p v\u1ecb trí này trong tu\u1ea7n này.<\/p>

M-Au: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c, tôi hi\u1ec3u.<\/p>

W-Am: N\u1ebfu anh ch\u1ea5p nh\u1eadn v\u1ecb trí này, chúng tôi mu\u1ed1n and \u0111\u1ebfn Chicago s\u1edbm \u0111\u1ec3 g\u1eb7p nhóm anh s\u1ebd làm vi\u1ec7c cùng. Và, t\u1ea5t nhiên, Ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb Thomasville luôn thanh toán chi phí \u0111i l\u1ea1i b\u1eb1ng máy bay và taxi liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn công vi\u1ec7c.<\/p>"}

childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef có ý gì khi cô \u1ea5y nói: "chúng tôi th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 mu\u1ed1n l\u1ea5p v\u1ecb trí trong tu\u1ea7n này"?<\/p>

A. \u1ee8ng viên nên quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh nhanh chóng.<\/p>

B. M\u1ed9t k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch thay th\u1ebf c\u1ea7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phê duy\u1ec7t.<\/p>

C. S\u1ebd c\u1ea7n thêm kinh phí.<\/p>

D. M\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi qu\u1ea3n lý s\u1ebd thay \u0111\u1ed5i l\u1ecbch trình.<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông \u0111ã nói:<\/p>

"Moving to Chicago would be a big decision for me, though, so I'll need to think about it."<\/p>","en":"

What does the woman mean when she says, "we'd really like to fill the position this week"?                <\/p>

A. A candidate should decide quickly.<\/p>

B. An alternative plan needs to be approved.<\/p>

C. Additional funding will be required.<\/p>

D. A manager will change a timeline.<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

The man said earlier: <\/p>

"Moving to Chicago would be a big decision for me, though, so I'll need to think about it."<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Kumiko, what are you posting on the notice board?

W-Am: Hi, Amelia. I'm organizing a company team for a charity event next weekend. It's a ten-kilometer run through the city. The money raised will be used for a neighborhood playground.

W-Br: Sounds good! By the way, I usually run with some of our colleagues during lunch. I'll talk to them tomorrow about joining the team.

W-Am: Great, thanks Amelia! We need ten people to make a full team.

W-Br: Hey, there's Martin. He likes running too. Martin, want to join our team? We're participating in a ten-kilometer run for charity. It's next weekend.

M-Cn: Next weekend? I wish I could! But I'll be in Washington for a conference then.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Kumiko, b\u1ea1n \u0111ang \u0111\u0103ng gì trên b\u1ea3ng thông báo v\u1eady?<\/p>

W-Am: Chào Amelia. Tôi \u0111ang s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ed9i c\u1ee7a công ty cho s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n t\u1eeb thi\u1ec7n vào cu\u1ed1i tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi. \u0110ó là ch\u1ea1y b\u1ed9 m\u01b0\u1eddi km qua thành ph\u1ed1. S\u1ed1 ti\u1ec1n quyên góp \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng cho m\u1ed9t sân ch\u01a1i trong khu ph\u1ed1.<\/p>

W-Br: Nghe hay \u0111\u1ea5y! Nhân ti\u1ec7n, tôi th\u01b0\u1eddng ch\u1ea1y v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 \u0111\u1ed3ng nghi\u1ec7p trong b\u1eefa tr\u01b0a. Tôi s\u1ebd nói chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi h\u1ecd vào ngày mai v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c tham gia \u0111\u1ed9i.<\/p>

W-Am: Tuy\u1ec7t, c\u1ea3m \u01a1n Amelia! Chúng tôi c\u1ea7n m\u01b0\u1eddi ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ea1o thành m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7.<\/p>

W-Br: Này, có Martin \u0111\u1ea5y. Anh \u1ea5y c\u0169ng thích ch\u1ea1y. Martin, mu\u1ed1n vào \u0111\u1ed9i không? Chúng tôi s\u1ebd tham gia m\u1ed9t bu\u1ed5i ch\u1ea1y b\u1ed9 dài 10 km \u0111\u1ec3 làm t\u1eeb thi\u1ec7n. Vào cu\u1ed1i tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi.<\/p>

M-Cn: Cu\u1ed1i tu\u1ea7n sau? Tôi mong tôi có th\u1ec3! Nh\u01b0ng lúc \u1ea5y tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn Washington d\u1ef1 m\u1ed9t h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: John, a customer is looking for this winter boot in a size ten. Could you find that for me, please?

M-Au: Actually, l'm just finishing my shift now.

W-Am: I'd really appreciate it if you could get this one last thing before you go.

M-Au: OK, sure. Oh... Last time I was in the stockroom, I noticed that we've sold out of a lot of sizes in this style. I'll go look, but it might be a good idea to ask the customer if she'd be interested in a different style.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: John, m\u1ed9t khách hàng \u0111ang tìm ki\u1ebfm chi\u1ebfc b\u1ed1t mùa \u0111ông này v\u1edbi kích th\u01b0\u1edbc 10. Anh có th\u1ec3 tìm nó cho tôi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không?<\/p>

M-Au: Th\u1ef1c ra, gi\u1edd tôi v\u1eeba xong ca làm.<\/p>

W-Am: Tôi s\u1ebd \u0111ánh giá cao vi\u1ec7c này n\u1ebfu anh có th\u1ec3 có làm n\u1ed1t tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi v\u1ec1.<\/p>

M-Au: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c, ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i. \u1ed2 ... L\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi tôi \u1edf trong kho, tôi th\u1ea5y chúng ta \u0111ã bán h\u1ebft kích c\u1ee1 ki\u1ec3u này. Tôi s\u1ebd \u0111i xem, nh\u01b0ng có th\u1ec3 là ý hay n\u1ebfu h\u1ecfi khách hàng r\u1eb1ng li\u1ec7u cô \u1ea5y thích m\u1ed9t ki\u1ec3u khác hay không.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Ms. Sorensen. It's Tony Reed calling from e-Energy Insight. I appreciate having the opportunity to tell you about our energy management software.

W-Br: Sure. As the manager of a large bank, I know that our energy bills are quite substantial. We're always looking for ways to cut energy costs.

M-Cn: Well, our software automatically controls the lighting, heating, and cooling of multiple rooms, as well as the energy needed for operating machines. It redirects the energy where it's needed, so that there's no waste.

W-Br: lnteresting. Would it be possible for you to give us a demonstration of how it all works?
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Cô Sorensen. \u0110ó là cu\u1ed9c g\u1ecdi c\u1ee7a Tony Reed t\u1eeb e-Energy Insight. Tôi \u0111ánh giá cao c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u v\u1edbi cô v\u1ec1 ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m qu\u1ea3n lý n\u0103ng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi.<\/p>

W-Br: Ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i. Là giám \u0111\u1ed1c c\u1ee7a m\u1ed9t ngân hàng l\u1edbn, tôi bi\u1ebft r\u1eb1ng hóa \u0111\u01a1n n\u0103ng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi khá l\u1edbn. Chúng tôi luôn tìm cách c\u1eaft gi\u1ea3m chi phí n\u0103ng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng.<\/p>

M-Cn: Chà, ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m c\u1ee7a chúng tôi t\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed9ng \u0111i\u1ec1u khi\u1ec3n ánh sáng, h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng s\u01b0\u1edfi và h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng làm mát c\u1ee7a nhi\u1ec1u phòng, c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 n\u0103ng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ec3 v\u1eadn hành máy móc. Nó chuy\u1ec3n h\u01b0\u1edbng n\u0103ng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng \u0111\u1ebfn nh\u1eefng n\u01a1i c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ec3 không lãng phí.<\/p>

W-Br: Th\u1eadt thú v\u1ecb. Anh có th\u1ec3 cung c\u1ea5p cho chúng tôi m\u1ed9t b\u1ea3n thuy\u1ebft minh v\u1ec1 cách ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng không?<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Thanks for calling the Forester Hotel. How can I help you?

M-Cn: Hi, I'm arranging the annual awards banquet for my company. I checked your Web site ... Can I reserve the Rose Hall for May fifteenth?

W-Am: Let me check the schedule... I'm afraid the Rose Hall's unavailable that day. The Sunflower Hall is available. It's 50 dollars more expensive than the Rose Hall, but it's larger.

M-Cn: Hmm, that's OK. The Sunflower Hall should be fine. I also had a question about food for the dinner. Can you recommend a good caterer?

W-Am: Oh, I'd recommend Sammy's Catering. It's popular because of the variety of vegetarian options they offer.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n \u0111ã g\u1ecdi \u0111\u1ebfn Khách s\u1ea1n Forester. Tôi có th\u1ec3 giúp gì cho anh?<\/p>

M-Cn: Xin chào, tôi \u0111ang s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp b\u1eefa ti\u1ec7c trao gi\u1ea3i h\u1eb1ng n\u0103m cho công ty. Tôi \u0111ã xem trên trang web ... Tôi có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1eb7t tr\u01b0\u1edbc H\u1ed9i tr\u01b0\u1eddng Hoa H\u1ed3ng vào ngày 15 tháng 5 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không?<\/p>

W-Am: \u0110\u1ec3 tôi ki\u1ec3m tra k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch ... Tôi e r\u1eb1ng H\u1ed9i tr\u01b0\u1eddng Hoa H\u1ed3ng không còn tr\u1ed1ng vào ngày hôm \u0111ó. H\u1ed9i tr\u01b0\u1eddng H\u01b0\u1edbng D\u01b0\u01a1ng thì còn. Nó \u0111\u1eaft h\u01a1n 50 \u0111ô la so v\u1edbi H\u1ed9i tr\u01b0\u1eddng Hoa H\u1ed3ng, nh\u01b0ng nó r\u1ed9ng h\u01a1n.<\/p>

M-Cn: Hmm, th\u1ebf c\u0169ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c. H\u1ed9i tr\u01b0\u1eddng H\u01b0\u1edbng D\u01b0\u01a1ng ch\u1eafc v\u1eabn \u1ed5n. Tôi c\u0169ng có m\u1ed9t câu h\u1ecfi v\u1ec1 \u0111\u1ed3 \u0103n cho b\u1eefa t\u1ed1i. Cô có th\u1ec3 gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u m\u1ed9t nhà cung c\u1ea5p th\u1ef1c ph\u1ea9m t\u1ed1t không?<\/p>

W-Am: \u1ed2, tôi mu\u1ed1n gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u c\u1eeda hàng D\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 \u0103n u\u1ed1ng Sammy. Nó r\u1ea5t n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng vì có nhi\u1ec1u l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn cho \u0111\u1ed3 \u0103n chay mà h\u1ecd cung c\u1ea5p.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Au: Michelle, thanks for agreeing to lead this afternoon's meeting with me. One topic I think we should discuss with the staff is factory productivity. We haven't met our quotas for lightbulbs for a few months.

W-Br: I know. Productivity hasn't been stable recently. We had a month of strong production, but the next month was the lowest we've had in a year!

M-Au: Right... So at today's meeting, let's focus on the month when productivity was very low.

W-Br: I know that our bulb manufacturing machines broke down several times that month. We should probably have all of them inspected.

M-Au: I agree. What else should we discuss at the staff meeting?
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Michelle, c\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã \u0111\u1ed3ng ý ch\u1ee7 trì cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp chi\u1ec1u nay v\u1edbi tôi. M\u1ed9t ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1 tôi ngh\u0129 chúng ta nên th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1edbi nhân viên là n\u0103ng su\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a nhà máy. Chúng ta \u0111ã không \u0111\u1ea1t h\u1ea1n ng\u1ea1ch cho bóng \u0111èn trong vài tháng.<\/p>

W-Br: Tôi bi\u1ebft. N\u0103ng su\u1ea5t không \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u1ed5n \u0111\u1ecbnh g\u1ea7n \u0111ây. Chúng ta \u0111ã có m\u1ed9t tháng s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t m\u1ea1nh, nh\u01b0ng tháng ti\u1ebfp theo l\u1ea1i là tháng th\u1ea5p nh\u1ea5t mà chúng ta có trong n\u0103m!<\/p>

M-Au: \u0110úng v\u1eady ... Vì th\u1ebf trong cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp hôm nay, chúng ta hãy t\u1eadp trung vào tháng mà n\u0103ng su\u1ea5t r\u1ea5t th\u1ea5p.<\/p>

W-Br: Tôi bi\u1ebft r\u1eb1ng máy móc s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t bóng \u0111èn c\u1ee7a chúng ta \u0111ã b\u1ecb h\u1ecfng vài l\u1ea7n trong tháng \u0111ó. Chúng ta có l\u1ebd nên ki\u1ec3m tra t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 máy móc.<\/p>

M-Au: Tôi \u0111\u1ed3ng ý. Chúng ta nên th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 nào khác t\u1ea1i cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp nhân viên không?<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Hi, Corey. I wanted to talk to you about the way we currently conduct hiring for the firm. I was thinking that we could reduce our workload in the human resources department by reducing the number of steps in the hiring process.

M-Au: Well, we have to be sure we hire the right people. We can't eliminate the phone call... That's the best way to decide who we should bring in for interviews. But we could stop doing a group interview.

W-Am: I agree. Honestly, those haven't provided much Information: about job candidates in the past.

M-Au: Good point.

W-Am: OK, Let's work on a presentation to show Mr. Kobayashi our idea.

M-Au: All right.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Chào Corey. Tôi mu\u1ed1n nói chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi anh v\u1ec1 cách chúng ta ti\u1ebfn hành tuy\u1ec3n d\u1ee5ng cho công ty g\u1ea7n \u0111ây. Tôi ngh\u0129 r\u1eb1ng chúng ta có th\u1ec3 gi\u1ea3m kh\u1ed1i l\u01b0\u1ee3ng công vi\u1ec7c \u1edf b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn nhân s\u1ef1 b\u1eb1ng cách gi\u1ea3m \u0111i m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 b\u01b0\u1edbc trong quy trình tuy\u1ec3n d\u1ee5ng.<\/p>

M-Au: Chà, chúng ta ph\u1ea3i ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn chúng ta tuy\u1ec3n d\u1ee5ng \u0111úng ng\u01b0\u1eddi. Chúng ta không th\u1ec3 lo\u1ea1i b\u1ecf vi\u1ec7c g\u1ecdi \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i ... \u0110ó là cách t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ec3 quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh ng\u01b0\u1eddi mà chúng ta nên m\u1eddi \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ec3 ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n. Nh\u01b0ng chúng ta có th\u1ec3 ng\u1eebng ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n nhóm.<\/p>

W-Am: Tôi \u0111\u1ed3ng ý. Thành th\u1eadt mà nói, nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111ó \u0111ã không cung c\u1ea5p nhi\u1ec1u thông tin v\u1ec1 các \u1ee9ng viên cho công vi\u1ec7c.<\/p>

M-Au: Ý hay.<\/p>

W-Am: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, chúng ta hãy làm m\u1ed9t bài thuy\u1ebft trình \u0111\u1ec3 cho ông Kobayashi th\u1ea5y ý t\u01b0\u1edfng c\u1ee7a chúng ta.<\/p>

M-Au: \u0110\u1ed3ng ý.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Short talks
parts.title: You will hear some talks given by a single speaker. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speaker says in each talk. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet. The talks will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

questions.text_audio: In local news, residents have long awaited the grand opening of the River City Zoo this Saturday. For this special grand-opening event, hours will be extended until eight P.M. And, the zoo will also be having a photo contest during the event. Be sure to take photos while you walk through the exhibits to submit for the contest. To read the contest rules and regulations, visit the zoo's Web site.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Theo tin t\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng, ng\u01b0\u1eddi dân t\u1eeb lâu \u0111ã ch\u1edd \u0111\u1ee3i s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng S\u1edf thú River City vào th\u1ee9 B\u1ea3y tu\u1ea7n này. \u0110\u1ed1i v\u1edbi s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t này, th\u1eddi gian s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c kéo dài \u0111\u1ebfn tám gi\u1edd t\u1ed1i. Và, v\u01b0\u1eddn thú c\u0169ng s\u1ebd có m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c thi \u1ea3nh trong s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n này. Hãy ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn ch\u1ee5p \u1ea3nh trong khi b\u1ea1n \u0111i qua các cu\u1ed9c tri\u1ec3n lãm \u0111\u1ec3 g\u1eedi cho cu\u1ed9c thi. \u0110\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ecdc các quy t\u1eafc và quy \u0111\u1ecbnh c\u1ee7a cu\u1ed9c thi, hãy truy c\u1eadp trang web c\u1ee7a v\u01b0\u1eddn thú.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Attention, passengers flying to Dublin. Since this flight is fully booked and luggage space will be limited, you may check extra bags for free. If you'd like to check your luggage to your final destination at no extra charge, you can speak to an airline representative at the gate desk. We'll begin boarding soon, so please check your ticket for your seat assignment. Thank you for flying with us.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Hành khách bay \u0111\u1ebfn Dublin chú ý. Vì chuy\u1ebfn bay này \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t h\u1ebft ch\u1ed7 và ch\u1ed7 \u0111\u1ec3 hành lý có h\u1ea1n, ông bà có th\u1ec3 ki\u1ec3m tra hành lý b\u1ed5 sung mi\u1ec5n phí. N\u1ebfu ông bà mu\u1ed1n ki\u1ec3m tra hành lý c\u1ee7a mình \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111\u1ebfn cu\u1ed1i cùng mà không ph\u1ea3i tr\u1ea3 thêm phí, ông bà có th\u1ec3 nói chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n hãng hàng không t\u1ea1i qu\u1ea7y \u1edf c\u1ed5ng. Chúng ta s\u1eafp lên máy bay, vì v\u1eady vui lòng ki\u1ec3m tra vé \u0111\u1ec3 bi\u1ebft ch\u1ed7 ng\u1ed3i c\u1ee7a ông bà. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n ông bà \u0111ã có chuy\u1ebfn bay cùng chúng tôi.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Glad to see everyone's back on the bus. I hope you've enjoyed today's tour of Rosedale so far. City Hall is one of my favorite stops. You may not have heard me say it, but our city hall is notable as the biggest government building in the nation. In a few minutes, we'll arrive at Carpton Market. It has some of the city's best local food. You'II have time to explore the market on your own-but the bus leaves at three P.M. I'll be walking around too, so join me if you'd like to hear more about the market.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

R\u1ea5t vui khi th\u1ea5y m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi quay l\u1ea1i xe buýt. Tôi hy v\u1ecdng các b\u1ea1n thích chuy\u1ebfn tham quan Rosedale ngày hôm nay. Tòa th\u1ecb chính là m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng \u0111i\u1ec3m d\u1eebng chân yêu thích c\u1ee7a tôi. Có th\u1ec3 b\u1ea1n ch\u01b0a nghe tôi nói v\u1ec1 \u0111i\u1ec1u này, nh\u01b0ng tòa th\u1ecb chính c\u1ee7a chúng ta n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng là tòa nhà chính ph\u1ee7 l\u1edbn nh\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 n\u01b0\u1edbc. Trong vài phút n\u1eefa, chúng ta s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn Ch\u1ee3 Carpton. \u1ede \u0111ó có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 món \u0103n \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ngon nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a thành ph\u1ed1. Các b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd có th\u1eddi gian \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ef1 mình khám phá khu ch\u1ee3 - nh\u01b0ng xe buýt s\u1ebd r\u1eddi \u0111i lúc 3 gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u. Tôi c\u0169ng s\u1ebd \u0111i b\u1ed9 xung quanh, vì v\u1eady hãy \u0111i cùng tôi n\u1ebfu các b\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n nghe thêm thông tin v\u1ec1 khu ch\u1ee3.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Recently we conducted a market survey about our new phone application called Minimarket. Well, we found that people of all ages like the idea of using their mobile phones to order groceries. However, there has been one consistent complaint about the app. According to users, the process for ordering groceries with this app is too complicated. So, we invited Lupe Gonzalez here to present some ideas. She's a technology consultant who has designed similar apps before.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

G\u1ea7n \u0111ây, chúng tôi \u0111ã ti\u1ebfn hành m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c kh\u1ea3o sát th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng v\u1ec1 \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i m\u1edbi có tên là Minimarket. Chúng tôi nh\u1eadn th\u1ea5y r\u1eb1ng m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u1edf m\u1ecdi l\u1ee9a tu\u1ed5i thích ý t\u01b0\u1edfng s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i di \u0111\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1eb7t hàng t\u1ea1p hóa. Tuy nhiên, \u0111ã có cùng m\u1ed9t phàn nàn v\u1ec1 \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng. Theo ng\u01b0\u1eddi dùng, quy trình \u0111\u1eb7t hàng t\u1ea1p hóa b\u1eb1ng \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng này quá ph\u1ee9c t\u1ea1p. Vì v\u1eady, chúng tôi \u0111ã m\u1eddi Lupe Gonzalez \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111ây \u0111\u1ec3 trình bày m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 ý t\u01b0\u1edfng. Cô \u1ea5y là m\u1ed9t c\u1ed1 v\u1ea5n công ngh\u1ec7, ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111ã thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf các \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng t\u01b0\u01a1ng t\u1ef1 tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Before you start this evening's shift, I'd like to make a quick announcement. As you know, we've had a very successful two months since our restaurant opened. But, of course, that means you've all been working some very long days and serving many customers at once. Now, we'd originally planned to have only six waiters on our staff, but our business is increasing. We'll be working to remedy the situation. In the meantime, to thank you for your hard work, we've arranged to get you all some complimentary tickets to the upcoming music festival. Enjoy the event!
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi các b\u1ea1n b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u ca làm vi\u1ec7c t\u1ed1i nay, tôi mu\u1ed1n thông báo nhanh. Nh\u01b0 các anh \u0111ã bi\u1ebft, chúng ta \u0111ã có hai tháng r\u1ea5t thành công k\u1ec3 t\u1eeb khi nhà hàng c\u1ee7a chúng ta m\u1edf c\u1eeda. Nh\u01b0ng, \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó có ngh\u0129a là t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các b\u1ea1n \u0111ã làm vi\u1ec7c trong m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 ngày r\u1ea5t dài và ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 nhi\u1ec1u khách hàng cùng m\u1ed9t lúc. Hi\u1ec7n gi\u1edd, ban \u0111\u1ea7u chúng ta d\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ecbnh ch\u1ec9 có sáu ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 trong \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 nhân viên, nh\u01b0ng công vi\u1ec7c kinh doanh c\u1ee7a chúng ta \u0111ang t\u0103ng lên. Chúng ta s\u1ebd làm vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u1ec3 kh\u1eafc ph\u1ee5c tình hình. Trong th\u1eddi gian ch\u1edd \u0111\u1ee3i, \u0111\u1ec3 c\u1ea3m \u01a1n s\u1ef1 ch\u0103m ch\u1ec9 c\u1ee7a các b\u1ea1n, chúng tôi \u0111ã s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp \u0111\u1ec3 g\u1eedi cho các b\u1ea1n m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 vé mi\u1ec5n phí \u0111\u1ec3 tham gia l\u1ec5 h\u1ed9i âm nh\u1ea1c s\u1eafp t\u1edbi. Hãy t\u1eadn h\u01b0\u1edfng s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n này!<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: As you all know, when sales at Henry's Home Furnishings dropped again last year, the executive board decided it was time to reevaluate our brand. Our research revealed that we were missing out on a large market-young adults who saw our products, especially our living room furniture, as "out-of-date" and "unimaginative''. So we're now launching an updated product line based on the latest trends, called Urban Henry. Some of the furniture will even feature wireless charging for mobile devices. Now, before the official launch in May, I'd like you, our public relations team, to prepare a press release to send to the usual business news outlets.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Nh\u01b0 các b\u1ea1n \u0111ã bi\u1ebft, khi doanh s\u1ed1 bán hàng t\u1ea1i \u0110\u1ed3 n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t Henry's l\u1ea1i gi\u1ea3m \u0111i vào n\u0103m ngoái, ban \u0111i\u1ec1u hành quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111ã \u0111\u1ebfn lúc \u0111ánh giá l\u1ea1i th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u c\u1ee7a chúng ta. Nghiên c\u1ee9u c\u1ee7a chúng ta cho th\u1ea5y r\u1eb1ng chúng tôi \u0111ã b\u1ecf l\u1ee1 m\u1ed9t th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng r\u1ed9ng l\u1edbn, nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi tr\u1ebb tu\u1ed5i \u0111ã cho r\u1eb1ng các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a chúng ta, \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t là \u0111\u1ed3 n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t phòng khách, là "l\u1ed7i th\u1eddi" và "không th\u1ec3 t\u01b0\u1edfng t\u01b0\u1ee3ng". Vì v\u1eady, chúng ta hi\u1ec7n \u0111ang tung ra m\u1ed9t dòng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt d\u1ef1a trên theo xu h\u01b0\u1edbng m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1ecdi là Urban Henry. M\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 \u0111\u1ed3 n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t th\u1eadm chí s\u1ebd có tính n\u0103ng s\u1ea1c không dây cho thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb di \u0111\u1ed9ng. Bây gi\u1edd, tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi ra m\u1eaft chính th\u1ee9c vào tháng 5, tôi mu\u1ed1n các b\u1ea1n, nhóm quan h\u1ec7 công chúng c\u1ee7a chúng ta, chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb m\u1ed9t thông cáo báo chí \u0111\u1ec3 g\u1eedi t\u1edbi các \u0111ài tin t\u1ee9c doanh nghi\u1ec7p thông th\u01b0\u1eddng.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Hello, this is Tom Pollard from Human Resources calling for Wilma. We're so happy you'll be joining our team at Moorestown Engineering. Could you come in next Monday morning for your orientation? After, you'll be able to meet some coworkers and have a tour of the facility. Just to warn you, getting to our office is a little tricky right now. The street we're on is closed to traffic because of construction. I recommend parking a couple of blocks away and walking. Also, I'd like to invite you to join me for lunch the day you come. That way, you can ask any questions you might have. Anyway, give me a call back to confirm.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Xin chào, là Tom Pollard t\u1eeb B\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn Nhân s\u1ef1 \u0111ang g\u1ecdi cho Wilma. Chúng tôi r\u1ea5t vui khi b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd tham gia \u0111\u1ed9i c\u1ee7a chúng tôi t\u1ea1i K\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt Moorestown. B\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ebfn vào sáng th\u1ee9 Hai t\u1edbi \u0111\u1ec3 tham gia bu\u1ed5i \u0111\u1ecbnh h\u01b0\u1edbng không? Sau \u0111ó, b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd có th\u1ec3 g\u1eb7p m\u1ed9t vài \u0111\u1ed3ng nghi\u1ec7p và tham quan c\u01a1 s\u1edf. Ch\u1ec9 là báo tr\u01b0\u1edbc cho b\u1ea1n, \u0111\u1ebfn v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi gi\u1edd có chút khó kh\u0103n. Con ph\u1ed1 chúng tôi \u1edf t\u1ea1i b\u1ecb ch\u1eb7n ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ti\u1ec7n giao thông vì \u0111ang xây d\u1ef1ng. Tôi khuyên b\u1ea1n nên \u0111\u1eadu xe cách \u0111ó vài dãy nhà và \u0111i b\u1ed9. Ngoài ra, tôi mu\u1ed1n m\u1eddi b\u1ea1n cùng \u0103n tr\u01b0a v\u1edbi tôi vào hôm b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn. Nh\u01b0 v\u1eady, b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1eb7t b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 câu h\u1ecfi nào mà b\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n. Dù sao, hãy g\u1ecdi l\u1ea1i cho tôi \u0111\u1ec3 xác nh\u1eadn.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Good afternoon, everyone. I want to compliment you all for your excellent work on the Peterson ad campaign. Their company has already seen a jump in sales from the advertisements we created! Next on the agenda, I want to let you know about a great professional development opportunity. We've decided to start offering reimbursement, covering tuition and other fees, for all employees who take classes at the local business school. And there are lots of great options to choose from. There's an interesting evening course called Creative Advertising and it has earned many awards. If you have any questions, let me know.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Chào m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi. Tôi mu\u1ed1n khen ng\u1ee3i t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các b\u1ea1n vì làm vi\u1ec7c xu\u1ea5t s\u1eafc trong chi\u1ebfn d\u1ecbch qu\u1ea3ng cáo c\u1ee7a Peterson. Công ty h\u1ecd \u0111ã ch\u1ee9ng ki\u1ebfn s\u1ef1 t\u0103ng v\u1ecdt v\u1ec1 doanh s\u1ed1 bán hàng t\u1eeb các qu\u1ea3ng cáo mà chúng ta làm! Ti\u1ebfp theo trong ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình làm vi\u1ec7c, tôi mu\u1ed1n cho các b\u1ea1n bi\u1ebft v\u1ec1 m\u1ed9t c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i phát tri\u1ec3n ngh\u1ec1 nghi\u1ec7p tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi. Chúng tôi \u0111ã quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb b\u1ed3i hoàn, bao g\u1ed3m h\u1ecdc phí và các kho\u1ea3n phí khác, cho t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nhân viên tham gia các l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc t\u1ea1i tr\u01b0\u1eddng kinh doanh \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng. Và có r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn t\u1ed1t \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ea1n l\u1ef1a. Có m\u1ed9t khóa h\u1ecdc hay vào bu\u1ed5i t\u1ed1i là Qu\u1ea3ng cáo Sáng t\u1ea1o và nó \u0111ã giành \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nhi\u1ec1u gi\u1ea3i th\u01b0\u1edfng. N\u1ebfu các b\u1ea1n có b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 câu h\u1ecfi nào, hãy cho tôi bi\u1ebft.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Hello, I'm calling because I can't find my sunglasses. I think I may have left them in one of your theaters yesterday. The sunglasses should be in a blue case-the case could have fallen under the seat. Anyway, I was at the four-thirty showing of Long Distance Run and was sitting toward the back of the theater with some friends. If the sunglasses are there, could you call me back to let me know? You can call me at any time. My number's 555-0129. Thanks.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Xin chào, tôi g\u1ecdi \u0111i\u1ec7n vì không tìm th\u1ea5y kính râm c\u1ee7a mình. Tôi ngh\u0129 có th\u1ec3 tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u1ec3 chúng \u1edf m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng r\u1ea1p hát c\u1ee7a các anh vào ngày hôm qua. Kính râm ch\u1eafc h\u1eb3n \u1edf trong h\u1ed9p \u0111\u1ef1ng màu xanh lam - chi\u1ebfc h\u1ed9p có th\u1ec3 \u0111ã b\u1ecb r\u01a1i d\u01b0\u1edbi gh\u1ebf. Nhân ti\u1ec7n, tôi c\u0169ng \u1edf bu\u1ed5i chi\u1ebfu Ch\u1ea1y \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng dài lúc 4 gi\u1edd 30 và ng\u1ed3i \u1edf phía sau nhà hát v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 ng\u01b0\u1eddi b\u1ea1n. N\u1ebfu kính râm \u1edf \u0111ó, các anh có th\u1ec3 g\u1ecdi l\u1ea1i cho tôi bi\u1ebft \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không? Các anh có th\u1ec3 g\u1ecdi cho tôi b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 lúc nào. S\u1ed1 c\u1ee7a tôi là 555-0129. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n.<\/p>"}

As shown in the graphic, where the speaker saw the show is Theater 2.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Good morning. We're happy you've joined our team at BG Gardening Service. I'd like to tell you about some of the landscaping you'll be responsible for. Our gardening company maintains the outdoor areas at the Delville Shopping Complex, and you'll be doing your first job over there today. Look at this map of the shopping complex. In the lower left, where Elm Road and Main Street meet, there's a small building. You'll be responsible for the gardens around that building. I'll explain more at the site. Let's head over there now so I can show you in person.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Xin chào. Chúng tôi r\u1ea5t vui m\u1eebng khi các b\u1ea1n tham gia vào \u0111\u1ed9i c\u1ee7a chúng tôi t\u1ea1i D\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 làm v\u01b0\u1eddn BG. Tôi mu\u1ed1n cho các b\u1ea1n bi\u1ebft v\u1ec1 m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 khu v\u1ef1c mà các b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd ch\u1ecbu trách nhi\u1ec7m. Công ty làm v\u01b0\u1eddn c\u1ee7a chúng tôi duy trì các khu v\u1ef1c ngoài tr\u1eddi t\u1ea1i Khu ph\u1ee9c h\u1ee3p mua s\u1eafm Delville và các b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd làm công vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a mình t\u1ea1i \u0111ó vào hôm nay. Hãy nhìn vào b\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ed3 khu ph\u1ee9c h\u1ee3p mua s\u1eafm này. \u1ede phía d\u01b0\u1edbi bên trái, n\u01a1i \u0110\u01b0\u1eddng Elm và ph\u1ed1 Main giao nhau, có m\u1ed9t tòa nhà nh\u1ecf. Các b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd ch\u1ecbu trách nhi\u1ec7m v\u01b0\u1eddn t\u01b0\u1ee3c xung quanh tòa nhà \u0111ó. Tôi s\u1ebd gi\u1ea3i thích thêm t\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m này. Bây gi\u1edd chúng ta hãy \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111ó \u0111\u1ec3 tôi có th\u1ec3 tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp ch\u1ec9 cho các b\u1ea1n.<\/p>"}
