parts.name: Incomplete sentences
parts.title: A word or pharse is missing in each of the sentences below. Four answer choices are given below each sentence. Select the best answer to complete the sentence. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

intro.title:
Example:
The mother held her newborn ____

childrens.title: The new interns have been very mindful of ____ parking regulations
childrens.answers: ["theirs","ours","our","they"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The new interns have been very mindful of our parking regulations.<\/p>###

Các th\u1ef1c t\u1eadp sinh m\u1edbi r\u1ea5t l\u01b0u tâm \u0111\u1ebfn các quy \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111\u1eadu xe c\u1ee7a chúng tôi.<\/p>

(A) theirs - c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd - \u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb s\u1edf h\u1eefu, không c\u1ea7n danh t\u1eeb theo sau<\/p>

(B) ours - c\u1ee7a chúng tôi - \u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb s\u1edf h\u1eefu, không c\u1ea7n danh t\u1eeb theo sau<\/p>

(C) our - c\u1ee7a chúng tôi - tính t\u1eeb s\u1edf h\u1eefu, \u0111\u1ee9ng tr\u01b0\u1edbc danh t\u1eeb<\/p>

(D) they - h\u1ecd, chúng - \u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb nhân x\u01b0ng, \u0111óng vai trò làm ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef trong câu<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích: <\/p>

Sau ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n là c\u1ee5m danh t\u1eeb "parking regulations" nên ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t tính t\u1eeb s\u1edf h\u1eefu.<\/p>","en":"

The new interns have been very mindful of our parking regulations.<\/p>###

(A) theirs - a possessive pronoun can be used without a following noun<\/p>

(B) ours - a possessive pronoun is used without a following noun<\/p>

(C) our - a possessive sits before a noun<\/p>

(D) they - a subject pronoun<\/p>###

Explanation: <\/p>

After the blank, it is a noun phrase "parking regulations" so we need a possessive adjective.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: To help the arts center improve its programming, please indicate which aspect of the workshop was most ____
childrens.answers: ["informative","primary","enthusiastic","financial"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

To help the arts center improve its programming, please indicate which aspect of the workshop was most informative.<\/p>###

\u0110\u1ec3 giúp trung tâm ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt c\u1ea3i thi\u1ec7n ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình, vui lòng cho bi\u1ebft khía c\u1ea1nh nào c\u1ee7a h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o mang l\u1ea1i nhi\u1ec1u thông tin nh\u1ea5t. <\/p>

(A) informative (adj.): cung c\u1ea5p nhi\u1ec1u thông tin<\/p>

(B) primary (adj.): chính, ch\u1ee7 y\u1ebfu<\/p>

(C) enthusiastic (adj.): nhi\u1ec7t tình<\/p>

(D) financial (adj.): (thu\u1ed9c) tài chính<\/p>","en":"

To help the arts center improve its programming, please indicate which aspect of the workshop was most informative.<\/p>###

(A) informative (adj.): providing a lot of useful Information:<\/p>

(B) primary (adj.): main<\/p>

(C) enthusiastic (adj.): feeling or showing a lot of excitement and interest<\/p>

(D) financial (adj.): connected with money and finance<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Mr. Gupta explained the ____ of the upgraded customer database to the sales team
childrens.answers: ["beneficial","benefits","benefited","benefiting"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Mr. Gupta explained the benefits of the upgraded customer database to the sales team.<\/p>###

Ông Gupta gi\u1ea3i thích nh\u1eefng l\u1ee3i ích c\u1ee7a c\u01a1 s\u1edf d\u1eef li\u1ec7u khách hàng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nâng c\u1ea5p \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi nhóm bán hàng.<\/p>

(A) beneficial (adj.): có l\u1ee3i <\/p>

(B) benefits (pl. n.): l\u1ee3i ích <\/p>

(C) benefited (v-ed): làm l\u1ee3i cho <\/p>

(D) benefiting (v-ing): làm l\u1ee3i cho<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích: <\/p>

Tr\u01b0\u1edbc ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n là m\u1ea1o t\u1eeb the và sau nó là gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb of nên ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t danh t\u1eeb.<\/p>","en":"

Mr. Gupta explained the benefits of the upgraded customer database to the sales team.<\/p>###

(A) beneficial = dvantageous <\/p>

(B) benefits = advantages <\/p>

(C) benefited (v-ed): to be useful <\/p>

(D) benefiting (v-ing): to be useful<\/p>###

Explanation: <\/p>

It is the article "the" before the blank and after it, it is the preposition "of", so we need a noun.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Buses leaving the city terminal were delayed due to icy conditions ____ the roads
childrens.answers: ["on","out","from","until"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Buses leaving the city terminal were delayed due to icy conditions on the roads.<\/p>###

Các chuy\u1ebfn xe buýt r\u1eddi tr\u1ea1m vé trong thành ph\u1ed1 b\u1ecb hoãn l\u1ea1i do tình tr\u1ea1ng b\u0103ng giá trên \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng.<\/p>

(A) on (conj.): trên<\/p>

(B) out (conj.): \u1edf ngoài<\/p>

(C) from (conj.): t\u1eeb<\/p>

(D) until (conj.): cho \u0111\u1ebfn khi<\/p>","en":"

Buses leaving the city terminal were delayed due to icy conditions on the roads.<\/p>###

(A) on (conj.) - show that something is in a position above something else and touching it<\/p>

(B) out (conj.) - away from the inside of a place or thing<\/p>

(C) from (conj.) - show the place where someone or something starts<\/p>

(D) until (conj.) - up to the point in time or the event mentioned<\/p>"}

childrens.title: If you have recently ____ a digital camera and want to learn how to use it, this course is for you
childrens.answers: ["purchased","purchase","purchasing","to purchase"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

If you have recently purchased a digital camera and want to learn how to use it, this course is for you.<\/p>###

N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n m\u1edbi mua m\u1ed9t chi\u1ebfc máy \u1ea3nh k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt s\u1ed1 và mu\u1ed1n tìm hi\u1ec3u cách s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng nó, thì khóa h\u1ecdc này là dành cho b\u1ea1n. <\/p>

(A) purchased (v-ed)<\/p>

(B) purchase (v.)<\/p>

(C) purchasing (v-ing)<\/p>

(D) to purchase (to v)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích: <\/p>

Câu c\u1ea7n chia \u1edf thì hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i hoàn thành (có hình th\u1ee9c have + past participle) nên t\u1eeb c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n \u1edf d\u1ea1ng quá kh\u1ee9 phân t\u1eeb.<\/p>","en":"

If you have recently purchased a digital camera and want to learn how to use it, this course is for you.<\/p>###

(A) purchased (v-ed)<\/p>

(B) purchase (v)<\/p>

(C) purchasing (v-ing)<\/p>

(D) to purchase (to v)<\/p>###

Explanation: <\/p>

The sentence is in the present perfect: have + past participle<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The upcoming ____ of Tantino Airport will ease congestion and modernize guest accommodations
childrens.answers: ["performance","supplement","deadline","renovation"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The upcoming renovation of Tantino Airport will ease congestion and modernize guest accommodations.<\/p>###

Vi\u1ec7c c\u1ea3i t\u1ea1o s\u1eafp t\u1edbi c\u1ee7a sân bay Tantino s\u1ebd gi\u1ea3m b\u1edbt t\u1eafc ngh\u1ebdn và \u0111\u1ed5i m\u1edbi n\u01a1i \u1edf c\u1ee7a khách.<\/p>

(A) performance (n.): vi\u1ec7c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n<\/p>

(B) supplement (n.): ph\u1ea7n b\u1ed5 sung<\/p>

(C) deadline (n.): h\u1ea1n cu\u1ed1i cùng<\/p>

(D) renovation (n.): vi\u1ec7c c\u1ea3i t\u1ea1o<\/p>","en":"

The upcoming renovation of Tantino Airport will ease congestion and modernize guest accommodations.<\/p>###

(A) performance (n.): the act of doing something<\/p>

(B) supplement (n.): something extra<\/p>

(C) deadline (n.): a point in time by which something must be done<\/p>

(D) renovation (n.): the act or process of repairing and improving something<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The study showed that customers aged 35 to 44 paid with a Sonoka credit card ____ than customers in any other age-group
childrens.answers: ["frequently","frequent","more frequently","frequency"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The study showed that customers aged 35 to 44 paid with a Sonoka credit card more frequently than customers in any other age-group.<\/p>###

Nghiên c\u1ee9u cho th\u1ea5y khách hàng t\u1eeb 35 \u0111\u1ebfn 44 tu\u1ed5i thanh toán b\u1eb1ng th\u1ebb tín d\u1ee5ng Sonoka th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên h\u01a1n so v\u1edbi b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 nhóm tu\u1ed5i nào khác.<\/p>

(A) frequently (adv.): th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên<\/p>

(B) frequent (adj.): th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên<\/p>

(C) more frequently: th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên h\u01a1n<\/p>

(D) frequency (n.): tính th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Sau ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n là t\u1eeb \"than\" nên \u0111ây là c\u1ea5u trúc d\u1ea1ng so sánh h\u01a1n: more + adj\/ adv + than<\/p>","en":"

The study showed that customers aged 35 to 44 paid with a Sonoka credit card more frequently than customers in any other age-group.<\/p>###

(A) frequently (adv.) = often<\/p>

(B) frequent (adj.): happening or doing something often<\/p>

(C) more frequently = more often<\/p>

(D) frequency (n.): the fact of something happening often<\/p>###

Explanation: <\/p>

The word \"than\" is right after the blank so nên it is a comparative: more + adj\/ adv + than<\/p>"}

childrens.title: You need to ____ a business plan before your loan application can be processed
childrens.answers: ["donate","request","confess","submit"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

You need to submit a business plan before your loan application can be processed.<\/p>###

Anh c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i n\u1ed9p b\u1ea3n k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch kinh doanh tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi \u0111\u01a1n xin vay c\u1ee7a anh có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x\u1eed lý. <\/p>

(A) donate (v.): cho, hi\u1ebfn<\/p>

(B) request (v.): \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb<\/p>

(C) confess (v.): thú nh\u1eadn<\/p>

(D) submit (v.): n\u1ed9p, \u0111\u1ec7 trình<\/p>","en":"

You need to submit a business plan before your loan application can be processed.<\/p>###

(A) donate (v.): give money or goods to help a person or organization<\/p>

(B) request (v.): ask for something politely or officially<\/p>

(C) confess (v.): admit that you have done something wrong or something that you feel guilty or bad about<\/p>

(D) submit (v.): give or offer something for a decision to be made by others<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The hotel's ____ shuttle bus will take guests to Hong Kong's major landmarks
childrens.answers: ["compliments","complimentary","compliment","complimenting"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The hotel's complimentary shuttle bus will take guests to Hong Kong's major landmarks.<\/p>###

Xe buýt \u0111\u01b0a \u0111ón mi\u1ec5n phí c\u1ee7a khách s\u1ea1n s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0a khách \u0111\u1ebfn các \u0111\u1ecba danh chính c\u1ee7a H\u1ed3ng Kông.<\/p>

(A) compliments (pl. n.): l\u1eddi khen<\/p>

(B) complimentary (adj.): mi\u1ec5n phí<\/p>

(C) compliment (v.): khen ng\u1ee3i<\/p>

(D) complimenting (v-ing): khen ng\u1ee3i<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Sau ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n là c\u1ee5m danh t\u1eeb \"shuttle bus\" nên ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t tính t\u1eeb.<\/p>","en":"

The hotel's complimentary shuttle bus will take guests to Hong Kong's major landmarks.<\/p>###

(A) compliments (pl. n.): comments that expresses praise or approval of somebody<\/p>

(B) complimentary (adj.): given free<\/p>

(C) compliment (v.): to praise or express admiration for someone<\/p>

(D) complimenting (v-ing): praising or express admiration for someone<\/p>###

Explanation: <\/p>

The noun phrase \"shuttle bus\" is right after the blank so we need an adjective here.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: ____ months of work to sell the Apton Building, the realtor finally succeeded last week
childrens.answers: ["Besides","After","Still","For"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

After months of work to sell the Apton Building, the realtor finally succeeded last week.<\/p>###

Sau nhi\u1ec1u tháng làm vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u1ec3 bán tòa nhà Apton, cu\u1ed1i cùng nhà môi gi\u1edbi \u0111ã giao bán thành công vào tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc.<\/p>

(A) Besides: Ngoài ra<\/p>

(B) After: Sau<\/p>

(C) Still: V\u1eabn<\/p>

(D) For: \u0110\u1ed1i v\u1edbi<\/p>","en":"

After months of work to sell the Apton Building, the realtor finally succeeded last week.<\/p>###

(A) Besides = In addition to<\/p>

(B) After: following in time<\/p>

(C) Still: despite what has just been said<\/p>

(D) For: intended to be given to<\/p>"}

childrens.title: We will review all four custodial-service bids and choose ____ that suits our needs
childrens.answers: ["some","one","others","either"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

We will review all four custodial-service bids and choose one that suits our needs.<\/p>###

Chúng tôi s\u1ebd xem xét t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 b\u1ed1n giá th\u1ea7u d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 trông coi và l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn giá th\u1ea7u phù h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi nhu c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. <\/p>

(A) some: m\u1ed9t vài<\/p>

(B) one - dùng thay th\u1ebf cho danh t\u1eeb s\u1ed1 ít \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nh\u1eafc \u0111\u1ebfn tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó<\/p>

(C) others: nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi khác\/ cái khác còn l\u1ea1i<\/p>

(D) either: m\u1ed7i ng\u01b0\u1eddi\/ v\u1eadt (trong hai)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích: <\/p>

\u0110\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb \"suits\" \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c chia \u1edf d\u1ea1ng s\u1ed1 ít nên ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n ph\u1ea3i là m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb \u1edf d\u1ea1ng s\u1ed1 ít nên \u0111áp án có th\u1ec3 là B ho\u1eb7c D. Tuy nhiên vì tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó nh\u1eafc \u0111\u1ebfn \"four custodial-service bids\" nên ph\u01b0\u01a1ng án \u0111úng là B.<\/p>","en":"

We will review all four custodial-service bids and choose one that suits our needs.<\/p>###

(A) some: an amount of something or a number of people or things<\/p>

(B) one - replaced with a person or a thing mentioned before<\/p>

(C) others: people or things that are additional or different to people or things that have been mentioned or are known about<\/p>

(D) either: one or the other of two<\/p>###

Explanation: <\/p>

\"suits\" is a singular verb so the blank is a singular pronoun. Otherwise, \"four custodial-service bids\" is mentioned before so the answer is B.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The client asked for ____ to the images in the advertising text
childrens.answers: ["standards","drawings","revisions","duplications"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The client asked for revisions to the images in the advertising text.<\/p>###

Khách hàng yêu c\u1ea7u s\u1eeda l\u1ea1i hình \u1ea3nh trong ph\u1ea7n ch\u1eef qu\u1ea3ng cáo. <\/p>

(A) standards (pl. n.): tiêu chu\u1ea9n<\/p>

(B) drawings (pl. n.): tranh v\u1ebd<\/p>

(C) revisions (pl. n.): b\u1ea3n s\u1eeda l\u1ea1i<\/p>

(D) duplications (pl. n.): b\u1ea3n sao chép<\/p>","en":"

The client asked for revisions to the images in the advertising text.<\/p>###

(A) standards (pl. n.): levels of quality<\/p>

(B) drawings (pl. n.): pictures made using a pencil or pen <\/p>

(C) revisions (pl. n.) = changes<\/p>

(D) duplications (pl. n.) = copies<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Please be advised ____ we have had to cancel your order because of a difficulty with our shipping agent
childrens.answers: ["that","of","whether","between"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Please be advised that we have had to cancel your order because of a difficulty with our shipping agent.<\/p>###

Xin \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thông báo r\u1eb1ng chúng tôi \u0111ã ph\u1ea3i h\u1ee7y \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1eb7t hàng c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n do g\u1eb7p khó kh\u0103n v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ea1i lý v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. <\/p>

(A) that + m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1<\/p>

(B) of + N\/V-ing<\/p>

(C) whether + m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1: có ... không<\/p>

(D) between: \u1edf gi\u1eefa hai ng\u01b0\u1eddi, hai s\u1ef1 v\u1eadt<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Sau ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n là m\u1ed9t m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1 mà n\u1ed9i dung c\u1ee7a câu \u1edf \u0111ây mang tính ch\u1ea5t thông báo nên ta dùng \"that\"<\/p>","en":"

Please be advised that we have had to cancel your order because of a difficulty with our shipping agent.<\/p>###

(A) that + clause<\/p>

(B) of + N\/V-ing<\/p>

(C) whether + clause - express a doubt or choice between two possibilities<\/p>

(D) between: in or into the space that separates two places, people, or objects<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

An informed clause is right after the blank so we use \"that\".<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Tin Creek Corporation ____ that its paper towels are the most absorbent on the market
childrens.answers: ["obtains","competes","inquires","claims"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Tin Creek Corporation claims that its paper towels are the most absorbent on the market.<\/p>###

T\u1eadp \u0111oàn Tin Creek kh\u1eb3ng \u0111\u1ecbnh kh\u0103n gi\u1ea5y c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd là lo\u1ea1i d\u1ec5 th\u1ea5m hút nh\u1ea5t trên th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng.<\/p>

(A) obtains (v-s): \u0111\u1ea1t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c<\/p>

(B) competes (v-s): c\u1ea1nh tranh<\/p>

(C) inquires (v-s): h\u1ecfi th\u0103m<\/p>

(D) claims (v-s): kh\u1eb3ng \u0111\u1ecbnh<\/p>","en":"

Tin Creek Corporation claims that its paper towels are the most absorbent on the market.<\/p>###

(A) obtains (v-s): gets something, especially by making an effort<\/p>

(B) competes (v-s): tries to be more successful than someone or something else<\/p>

(C) inquires (v-s): asks somebody for some Information:<\/p>

(D) claims (v-s): says something is true<\/p>"}

childrens.title: KCLN Associates will enter into to a business ____ with the contractor as soon as some of the terms are renegotiated
childrens.answers: ["agreed","agreement","agreeable","agreeing"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

KCLN Associates will enter into to a business agreement with the contractor as soon as some of the terms are renegotiated.<\/p>###

KCLN Associates s\u1ebd ký k\u1ebft th\u1ecfa thu\u1eadn kinh doanh v\u1edbi nhà th\u1ea7u ngay sau khi m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 \u0111i\u1ec1u kho\u1ea3n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u01b0\u01a1ng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng l\u1ea1i. <\/p>

(A) agreed (v-ed): \u0111\u1ed3ng ý<\/p>

(B) agreement (n.): th\u1ecfa thu\u1eadn<\/p>

(C) agreeable (adj.): s\u1eb5n sàng tán thành<\/p>

(D) agreeing (v-ing): \u0111\u1ed3ng ý<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích: <\/p>

Tr\u01b0\u1edbc ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n là danh t\u1eeb \"business\" và sau nó là gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb \"with\" nên \u1edf \u0111ây ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t danh t\u1eeb. <\/p>","en":"

KCLN Associates will enter into to a business agreement with the contractor as soon as some of the terms are renegotiated.<\/p>###

(A) agreed (v-ed): had the same opinion as somebody<\/p>

(B) agreement (n.): a decision or arrangement, often formal and written, between two or more groups or people<\/p>

(C) agreeable (adj.): willing to do something<\/p>

(D) agreeing (v-ing): having the same opinion as somebody<\/p>###

Explanation: <\/p>

The blank is right after the noun \"business\" và right before the preposition \"with\" so we use a noun here.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: ____ registering for online banking is not required, we strongly recommend it to all of our customers
childrens.answers: ["Although","Instead","Regardless","Despite"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Although registering for online banking is not required, we strongly recommend it to all of our customers.<\/p>###

M\u1eb7c dù \u0111\u0103ng ký ngân hàng tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn không b\u1eaft bu\u1ed9c, nh\u01b0ng chúng tôi chân thành khuyên t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các khách hàng c\u1ee7a mình nên \u0111\u0103ng ký. <\/p>

(A) Although + m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1: M\u1eb7c dù<\/p>

(B) Instead: Thay vì - là tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb liên k\u1ebft, th\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u1ee9ng \u0111\u1ea7u câu ho\u1eb7c ngay sau \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb<\/p>

(C) Regardless: B\u1ea5t ch\u1ea5p (on regardless - th\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u1ee9ng \u1edf cu\u1ed1i câu)<\/p>

(D) Despite + N\/V-ing: M\u1eb7c dù<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích: <\/p>

\"registering for online banking is not required\" là m\u1ed9t m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1 có m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 t\u01b0\u01a1ng ph\u1ea3n v\u1edbi v\u1ebf sau \"we strongly recommend it to all of our customers\" nên ta dùng \"Although\".<\/p>","en":"

Although registering for online banking is not required, we strongly recommend it to all of our customers.<\/p>###

(A) Although + clause - used for introducing a statement that makes the main statement in a sentence seem surprising<\/p>

(B) Instead: in the place of somebody\/something - a linking adverb, usually at the beginning of a sentence or immediately after the verb <\/p>

(C) Regardless: paying no attention, even if the situation is bad or there are difficulties (on regardless - usually at the end of a sentence)<\/p>

(D) Despite + N\/V-ing - shows that something happened or is true although something else might have happened to prevent it<\/p>###

Explanation: <\/p>

\"registering for online banking is not required\" is a clause having a contrasting relationship with the following clause \"we strongly recommend it to all of our customers\" so we use \"Although\".<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Viewers can easily ____ to the main character in the popular television series Autumn Mystery
childrens.answers: ["related","relatable","relating","relate"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Viewers can easily relate to the main character in the popular television series Autumn Mystery.<\/p>###

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi xem có th\u1ec3 d\u1ec5 dàng liên t\u01b0\u1edfng \u0111\u1ebfn nhân v\u1eadt chính trong b\u1ed9 phim truy\u1ec1n hình n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng Bí \u1ea9n mùa thu. <\/p>

(A) related (adj.): có liên quan<\/p>

(B) relatable (adj.): có kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng liên quan<\/p>

(C) relating (v-ing): có liên quan<\/p>

(D) relate (v.): có liên quan<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta có: can + bare-V<\/p>","en":"

Viewers can easily relate to the main character in the popular television series Autumn Mystery.<\/p>###

(A) related (adj.): connected with something\/somebody in some way<\/p>

(B) relatable (adj.): able to be related to something else<\/p>

(C) relating (v-ing) = connecting<\/p>

(D) relate (v.) = connect<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

can + bare-V<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Fairlawn Medical Clinic offers a full ____ of services as part of its community wellness programs.
childrens.answers: ["center","surplus","range","type"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Fairlawn Medical Clinic offers a full range of services as part of its community wellness programs.<\/p>###

Phòng khám Y t\u1ebf Fairlawn cung c\u1ea5p \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 các d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 nh\u01b0 m\u1ed9t ph\u1ea7n c\u1ee7a các ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình ch\u0103m sóc s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng. <\/p>

(A) center (n.): trung tâm (the center + danh t\u1eeb s\u1ed1 ít)<\/p>

(B) surplus (n.): s\u1ed1 d\u01b0<\/p>

(C) range (n.): dãy, lo\u1ea1i (a range of + danh t\u1eeb s\u1ed1 nhi\u1ec1u: các lo\u1ea1i ...)<\/p>

(D) type (n.): lo\u1ea1i (a type of + danh t\u1eeb s\u1ed1 ít)<\/p>","en":"

Fairlawn Medical Clinic offers a full range of services as part of its community wellness programs. <\/p>###

(A) center (n.): the middle point or part of something (the center + singular noun)<\/p>

(B) surplus (n.): an amount that is extra or more than you need<\/p>

(C) range (n.): a variety of things of a particular type (a range of + plural nouns)<\/p>

(D) type (n.): a kind or sort (a type of + singular noun)<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The rear entrance to RC Bank will be closed for repairs and not ____ next Monday
childrens.answers: ["accessible","accessing","access","accesses"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The rear entrance to RC Bank will be closed for repairs and not accessible next Monday.<\/p>###

L\u1ed1i vào phía sau c\u1ee7a Ngân hàng RC s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111óng l\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ec3 s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa và không th\u1ec3 \u0111i vào \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c vào th\u1ee9 Hai t\u1edbi. <\/p>

(A) accessible (adj.): có th\u1ec3 t\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c<\/p>

(B) accessing (v-ing): ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn<\/p>

(C) access (v.): ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn<\/p>

(D) accesses (v-es): ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích: <\/p>

\u0110\u1ec3 ch\u1ec9 kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng x\u1ea3y ra c\u1ee7a m\u1ed9t s\u1ef1 vi\u1ec7c, trong tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ee3p này ta s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng tính t\u1eeb \u0111uôi -ible.<\/p>","en":"

The rear entrance to RC Bank will be closed for repairs and not accessible next Monday.<\/p>###

(A) accessible (adj.): that can be reached<\/p>

(B) accessing (v-ing): reaching<\/p>

(C) access (v.): reach<\/p>

(D) accesses (v-es): reaches<\/p>###

Explanation: <\/p>

To indicate the possibility of an event, we use the adjective ending with -ible.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Mr. Carson wants to see Carson audio products ____ , even in remote regions of the world
childrens.answers: ["decidedly","furthermore","rather","everywhere"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Mr. Carson wants to see Carson audio products everywhere, even in remote regions of the world.<\/p>###

Ông Carson mu\u1ed1n th\u1ea5y các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m âm thanh c\u1ee7a Carson \u1edf kh\u1eafp m\u1ecdi n\u01a1i, ngay c\u1ea3 \u1edf nh\u1eefng vùng xa xôi trên th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi. <\/p>

(A) decidedly: rõ ràng, d\u1ee9t khoát<\/p>

(B) furthermore: h\u01a1n n\u1eefa<\/p>

(C) rather: \u0111úng h\u01a1n là<\/p>

(D) everywhere: m\u1ecdi n\u01a1i<\/p>","en":"

Mr. Carson wants to see Carson audio products everywhere, even in remote regions of the world. <\/p>###

(A) decidedly: definitely and in an obvious way<\/p>

(B) furthermore = moreover<\/p>

(C) rather - used to correct something you have said, or to give more accurate Information:<\/p>

(D) everywhere: all places<\/p>"}

childrens.title: We can buy office ____ such as desks and printers from any of our company's approved vendors
childrens.answers: ["equip","equipping","equipment","equipped"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

We can buy office equipment such as desks and printers from any of our company's approved vendors.<\/p>###

Chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 mua thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb v\u0103n phòng nh\u01b0 bàn làm vi\u1ec7c và máy in t\u1eeb b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 nhà cung c\u1ea5p nào \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c công ty chúng tôi ch\u1ea5p thu\u1eadn. <\/p>

(A) equip (v.): trang b\u1ecb<\/p>

(B) equipping (v-ing): trang b\u1ecb<\/p>

(C) equipment (n.): trang thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb<\/p>

(D) equipped (v-ed): \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang b\u1ecb<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Tr\u01b0\u1edbc ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n là danh t\u1eeb \"office\" và sau nó là c\u1ee5m \"such as\" nên \u1edf \u0111ây ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t danh t\u1eeb.<\/p>","en":"

We can buy office equipment such as desks and printers from any of our company's approved vendors.<\/p>###

(A) equip (v.): provide a person or a place with objects that are necessary for a particular purpose<\/p>

(B) equipping (v-ing): providing a person or a place with objects that are necessary for a particular purpose<\/p>

(C) equipment (n.): the things that are needed for a particular purpose or activity<\/p>

(D) equipped (v-ed): provided with objects that are necessary for a particular purpose<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Tr\u01b0\u1edbc ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n là danh t\u1eeb \"office\" và sau nó là c\u1ee5m \"such as\" nên \u1edf \u0111ây ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t danh t\u1eeb.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: When taking a book order, agents must record the customer's name and the ____ price of each item
childrens.answers: ["assembled","listed","addressed","earned"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

When taking a book order, agents must record the customer's name and the listed price of each item.<\/p>###

Khi \u0111\u1eb7t hàng, \u0111\u1ea1i lý ph\u1ea3i ghi tên khách hàng và giá niêm y\u1ebft c\u1ee7a t\u1eebng m\u1eb7t hàng. <\/p>

(A) assembled: \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thu th\u1eadp<\/p>

(B) listed: \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c niêm y\u1ebft<\/p>

(C) addressed: \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ec1 \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9<\/p>

(D) earned: ki\u1ebfm ti\u1ec1n<\/p>","en":"

When taking a book order, agents must record the customer's name and the listed price of each item.<\/p>###

(A) assembled: come together as a group<\/p>

(B) listed: to be put in a list of things for sale<\/p>

(C) addressed: written with a name or address on an envelope or parcel<\/p>

(D) earned: got money for work that you do<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The building will be furnished ____ the supervisors do their inspection
childrens.answers: ["with","these","once","just"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The building will be furnished once the supervisors do their inspection.<\/p>###

Tòa nhà s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang b\u1ecb n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t ngay khi các giám sát viên ki\u1ec3m tra.<\/p>

(A) with + N: v\u1edbi <\/p>

(B) these (+ danh t\u1eeb s\u1ed1 nhi\u1ec1u): nh\u1eefng cái này<\/p>

(C) once + m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1: ngay khi<\/p>

(D) just: v\u1eeba m\u1edbi<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích: <\/p>

\u0110\u1ec3 n\u1ed1i hai m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1 v\u1edbi nhau ta dùng tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb \"once\".<\/p>","en":"

The building will be furnished once the supervisors do their inspection.<\/p>###

Tòa nhà s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang b\u1ecb n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t ngay khi các giám sát viên ki\u1ec3m tra.<\/p>

(A) with + N: having or carrying something <\/p>

(B) these (+ plural N) - used to refer to people or things that are close to you<\/p>

(C) once + clause = as soon as <\/p>

(D) just - used to say that you\/somebody did something or something happened very recently<\/p>###

Explanation: <\/p>

To connect two clauses together we use the adverb \"once\".<\/p>"}

childrens.title: In a strong display of confidence, the firm's board of directors ____ approved the merge
childrens.answers: ["superficially","regularly","magnificently","unanimously"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

In a strong display of confidence, the firm's board of directors unanimously approved the merge.<\/p>###

Tr\u01b0\u1edbc s\u1ef1 tin t\u01b0\u1edfng m\u1ea1nh m\u1ebd, ban giám \u0111\u1ed1c c\u1ee7a công ty \u0111ã nh\u1ea5t trí thông qua vi\u1ec7c sáp nh\u1eadp.<\/p>

(A) superficially: thi\u1ec3n c\u1eadn<\/p>

(B) regularly: \u0111\u1ec1u \u0111\u1eb7n<\/p>

(C) magnificently: tráng l\u1ec7<\/p>

(D) unanimously: nh\u1ea5t trí<\/p>","en":"

In a strong display of confidence, the firm's board of directors unanimously approved the merge.<\/p>###

(A) superficially: not carefully<\/p>

(B) regularly: often<\/p>

(C) magnificently: in a way that is extremely attractive and impressive<\/p>

(D) unanimously: by everyone in a particular group<\/p>"}

childrens.title: When recently ____ , residents of Mill Creek Park said that street disrepair is the issue that concerns them most
childrens.answers: ["poll","polls","pollster","polled"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

When recently polled, residents of Mill Creek Park said that street disrepair is the issue that concerns them most.<\/p>###

Khi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u0103m dò ý ki\u1ebfn g\u1ea7n \u0111ây, c\u01b0 dân c\u1ee7a Mill Creek Park nói r\u1eb1ng tình tr\u1ea1ng xu\u1ed1ng c\u1ea5p \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng ph\u1ed1 là v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 khi\u1ebfn h\u1ecd quan tâm nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>

(A) poll (v.): th\u0103m dò<\/p>

(B) polls (v-s): th\u0103m dò<\/p>

(C) pollster (n.): ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111i th\u0103m dò ý ki\u1ebfn<\/p>

(D) polled (v-ed): \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u0103m dò<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích: <\/p>

Vì hai v\u1ebf c\u1ee7a câu có cùng ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef \"residents of Mill Creek Park\" nên \u1edf m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1 \u0111\u1ea7u tiên ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c rút g\u1ecdn. M\u1eb7t khác do ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef ch\u1ecbu s\u1ef1 tác \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a hành \u0111\u1ed9ng \"poll\" nên \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb trong v\u1ebf này \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c chia \u1edf d\u1ea1ng quá kh\u1ee9 phân t\u1eeb.<\/p>","en":"

When recently polled, residents of Mill Creek Park said that street disrepair is the issue that concerns them most.<\/p>###

(A) poll (v.) = survey (ask a large number of members of the public what they think about something)<\/p>

(B) polls (v-s)<\/p>

(C) pollster (n.): a person who makes or asks the questions in an opinion poll<\/p>

(D) polled (v-ed)<\/p>###

Explanation: <\/p>

Both of clauses have the same subject \"residents of Mill Creek Park\" so the subject in the first clause is removed. Otherwise, the subject receives the action of the verb \"poll\" so we use the past participle of the verb.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Ms. Rivera agreed to work on the holiday ____ Mr. Grant could attend the conference
childrens.answers: ["considering","so that","as if","wherever"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ms. Rivera agreed to work on the holiday so that Mr. Grant could attend the conference.<\/p>###

Bà Rivera \u0111\u1ed3ng ý làm vi\u1ec7c vào k\u1ef3 ngh\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ec3 ông Grant có th\u1ec3 tham d\u1ef1 h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb.<\/p>

(A) considering: xét v\u1ec1, tính \u0111\u1ebfn<\/p>

(B) so that: \u0111\u1ec3 mà<\/p>

(C) as if: nh\u01b0 th\u1ec3<\/p>

(D) wherever: b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 \u0111âu<\/p>","en":"

Ms. Rivera agreed to work on the holiday so that Mr. Grant could attend the conference.<\/p>###

(A) considering - used to show that you are thinking about a particular fact, and are influenced by it, when you make a statement about something<\/p>

(B) so that - to talk about purpose<\/p>

(C) as if - in a way that suggests something<\/p>

(D) wherever: in any place<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The clerk collects packages from each department twice a day and takes them to the mail room ____
childrens.answers: ["throughout","all along","too much","downstairs"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The clerk collects packages from each department twice a day and takes them to the mail room downstairs.<\/p>###

Nhân viên thu th\u1eadp các gói hàng t\u1eeb m\u1ed7i b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn hai l\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t ngày và \u0111\u01b0a chúng \u0111\u1ebfn phòng th\u01b0 \u1edf t\u1ea7ng d\u01b0\u1edbi.<\/p>

(A) throughout + N: \u1edf kh\u1eafp<\/p>

(B) all along: ngay t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ea7u<\/p>

(C) too much: quá nhi\u1ec1u<\/p>

(D) downstairs: t\u1ea7ng d\u01b0\u1edbi<\/p>","en":"

The clerk collects packages from each department twice a day and takes them to the mail room downstairs.<\/p>###

(A) throughout + N: in or into every part of something<\/p>

(B) all along: from the beginning<\/p>

(C) too much: a situation or experience that is too difficult to deal with<\/p>

(D) downstairs: down the stairs<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Please inform Ms. Erwin of any complaints ____ those already discussed in today's meeting
childrens.answers: ["beyond","between","during","against"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Please inform Ms. Erwin of any complaints beyond those already discussed in today's meeting.<\/p>###

Vui lòng thông báo cho bà Erwin v\u1ec1 b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 khi\u1ebfu n\u1ea1i nào ngoài nh\u1eefng khi\u1ebfu n\u1ea1i \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn trong cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp hôm nay.<\/p>

(A) beyond: n\u1eb1m ngoài, ngo\u1ea1i tr\u1eeb<\/p>

(B) between: \u1edf gi\u1eefa hai ng\u01b0\u1eddi\/ hai v\u1eadt<\/p>

(C) during: trong su\u1ed1t (th\u1eddi gian)<\/p>

(D) against: ch\u1ed1ng l\u1ea1i<\/p>","en":"

Please inform Ms. Erwin of any complaints beyond those already discussed in today's meeting.<\/p>###

(A) beyond: on or to the further side of something<\/p>

(B) between: in or into the space that separates two places, people, or objects<\/p>

(C) during: all through a period of time<\/p>

(D) against: opposing or disagreeing with somebody\/something<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The Tonsin Writers League is a reputable organization with highly ____ members
childrens.answers: ["accomplishes","accomplishment","accomplished","accomplish"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The Tonsin Writers League is a reputable organization with highly accomplished members.<\/p>###

Liên \u0111oàn các tác gia Tonsin là m\u1ed9t t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c có uy tín v\u1edbi các thành viên r\u1ea5t tài n\u0103ng.<\/p>

(A) accomplishes (v-es): hoàn thành<\/p>

(B) accomplishment (n.): s\u1ef1 hoàn thành<\/p>

(C) accomplished (adj.): có tài n\u0103ng<\/p>

(D) accomplish (v.): hoàn thành<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Tr\u01b0\u1edbc ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n là tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb \"highly\" và sau nó là danh t\u1eeb \"members\" nên ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t tính t\u1eeb.<\/p>","en":"

The Tonsin Writers League is a reputable organization with highly accomplished members.<\/p>###

(A) accomplishes (v-es): succeeds in doing or completing something<\/p>

(B) accomplishment (n.): an impressive thing that is done or achieved after a lot of work<\/p>

(C) accomplished (adj.): very good at a particular thing<\/p>

(D) accomplish (v.): succeed in doing or completing something<\/p>###

Explanation: <\/p>

The blank is right after the adverb \"highly\" và right before the noun \"members\" so we use an adjective here.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: As Mr. Naketa's assistant, Ms. Bain is in charge of ____ him on the last financial news
childrens.answers: ["discussing","briefing","resuming","narrating"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

As Mr. Naketa's assistant, Ms. Bain is in charge of briefing him on the last financial news.<\/p>###

Là tr\u1ee3 lý c\u1ee7a ông Naketa, cô Bain ph\u1ee5 trách vi\u1ec7c tóm t\u1eaft l\u1ea1i cho ông \u1ea5y nh\u1eefng tin t\u1ee9c tài chính m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>

(A) discussing (v-ing): th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn<\/p>

(B) briefing (v-ing): tóm t\u1eaft l\u1ea1i<\/p>

(C) resuming (v-ing): ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c<\/p>

(D) narrating (v-ing): k\u1ec3 l\u1ea1i<\/p>","en":"

As Mr. Naketa's assistant, Ms. Bain is in charge of briefing him on the last financial news.<\/p>###

(A) discussing (v-ing): talking about a subject with someone and tell each other your ideas or opinions<\/p>

(B) briefing (v-ing): giving someone detailed instructions or Information:<\/p>

(C) resuming (v-ing): starting doing something again after a pause <\/p>

(D) narrating (v-ing): telling a story<\/p>"}

parts.name: Text completion
parts.title: Read the texts that follow. A word or pharse is missing in some of the sentences. Four answer choices are given below each of the sentences. Select the best answer to complete the text. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

questions.text_read:
To: Bai Chang <[email protected]>
From: [email protected]
Date: September 28
Subject: Order 255646

Dear Ms. Chang: 

Thank you for your purchase on September 27. Your package has shipped and is due to arrive on October 1. __(1)__ Simply visit www.sprtech.com/shipping/stalus, enter your order number, and press "Search."

When you receive your package, we __(2)__ you to take a short survey at www.sprtech.com/survey. It is through customer feedback that we are __(3)__ to monitor our level of service. Upon __(4)__ of the survey, you will receive a 10% discount toward your next order. 

Sprtech.com Customer Service

__(2)__<\/p>

A. invited - used in the past simple<\/p>

B. invite  - used in the present simple <\/p>

C. were inviting - used in the past continuous <\/p>

D. have invited - used in the present perfect<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Because when-clause is used in the present simple, the main clause is also used in the present simple.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read: Conference Room 120 can be booked for meetings and conference calls. First, make a reservation request online at www.gzpoffice.com/confroom. When your request __(1)__ , the system automatically checks for availability. Your request will be accepted if no other event is scheduled at that time. The system will then immediately send you an e-mall message to __(2)__ your reservation. However, if another meeting is scheduled that conflicts with yours, you will be notified that the request has been declined. __(3)__ . It is therefore __(4)__ that you schedule your event well ahead of time. This way, if a given time slot is already reserved, you will be able to reschedule your meeting.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Phòng H\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb 120 có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t cho các cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp và cu\u1ed9c g\u1ecdi h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb. Tr\u01b0\u1edbc tiên, hãy th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n yêu c\u1ea7u \u0111\u1eb7t phòng tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn t\u1ea1i www.gzpoffice.com\/confroom. Khi nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n, h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng s\u1ebd t\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed9ng ki\u1ec3m tra phòng còn tr\u1ed1ng hay không. Yêu c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ea5p nh\u1eadn n\u1ebfu không có s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n nào khác \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t l\u1ecbch vào th\u1eddi gian \u0111ó. Sau \u0111ó h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng s\u1ebd ngay l\u1eadp t\u1ee9c g\u1eedi cho b\u1ea1n m\u1ed9t tin nh\u1eafn qua th\u01b0 \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed \u0111\u1ec3 xác nh\u1eadn vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u1eb7t ch\u1ed7 c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n. Tuy nhiên, n\u1ebfu m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp khác \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t l\u1ecbch trùng v\u1edbi cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n, b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thông báo yêu c\u1ea7u b\u1ecb t\u1eeb ch\u1ed1i. L\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u1eb7t ch\u1ed7 d\u1ef1a trên c\u01a1 s\u1edf ai \u0111\u1ebfn tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 tr\u01b0\u1edbc. Do \u0111ó, b\u1ea1n nên \u0111\u1eb7t l\u1ecbch cho s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n c\u1ee7a mình s\u1edbm. B\u1eb1ng cách này, n\u1ebfu m\u1ed9t kho\u1ea3ng th\u1eddi gian nh\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t tr\u01b0\u1edbc, b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1eb7t l\u1ecbch l\u1ea1i cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp c\u1ee7a mình.<\/p>"}

The subject your request receives the action of the verb receive so the verb is used in passive voice.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
From: Karel Authier <[email protected]> 
To: Honorato Quinones <[email protected]>
Date: Tuesday, July 18 11:04 A.M.
Subject Voyacon Feature 

Dear Mr. Quinones:

I am delighted to inform you that Voyacon has been selected as one of this year's Code Touch Magazine's Top 25 Emerging Technology Firms. We will be __(1)__ your company in our September issue. This is considered a great honor by our readers, as our list includes only __(2)__ that advance the industry in significant ways. 
As Voyacon's founder, could you e-mail us a digital photograph of yourself to use in the article? __(3)__ We would need to receive it __(4)__ August 5. Otherwise, we will use a public-domain photo. Thanks for your help, and congratulations.

Sincerely, 

Karel Authier
Editor-in-Chief
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1eeb: Karel Authier <[email protected]><\/strong><\/p>

T\u1edbi: Honorato Quinones <[email b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7]><\/strong><\/p>

Ngày: Th\u1ee9 Ba, ngày 18 tháng 7 11:04 A.M.<\/strong><\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Bài v\u1ec1 Voyacon<\/strong><\/p>

Kính g\u1eedi ông Quinones:<\/p>

Tôi r\u1ea5t vui m\u1eebng \u0111\u1ec3 thông báo v\u1edbi ông r\u1eb1ng Voyacon \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ecdn là m\u1ed9t trong 25 hãng Công ngh\u1ec7 m\u1edbi n\u1ed5i hàng \u0111\u1ea7u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c T\u1ea1p chí Code Touch bình ch\u1ecdn n\u0103m nay. Chúng tôi s\u1ebd gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u công ty c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n trong \u1ea5n b\u1ea3n tháng 9 c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. \u0110ây \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c coi là m\u1ed9t vinh d\u1ef1 l\u1edbn cho \u0111\u1ed9c gi\u1ea3 c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, vì danh sách c\u1ee7a chúng tôi ch\u1ec9 bao g\u1ed3m các doanh nghi\u1ec7p phát tri\u1ec3n ngành công nghi\u1ec7p \u0111áng k\u1ec3.<\/p>

V\u1edbi t\u01b0 cách là ng\u01b0\u1eddi sáng l\u1eadp Voyacon, ông có th\u1ec3 g\u1eedi e-mail cho chúng tôi m\u1ed9t b\u1ee9c \u1ea3nh k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt s\u1ed1 c\u1ee7a chính ông \u0111\u1ec3 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng trong bài báo không? B\u1ee9c \u1ea3nh nên có \u0111\u1ed9 phân gi\u1ea3i cao và có màu. Chúng tôi c\u1ea7n nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nó tr\u01b0\u1edbc ngày 5 tháng 8. N\u1ebfu không, chúng tôi s\u1ebd s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng \u1ea3nh mi\u1ec1n công c\u1ed9ng. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n s\u1ef1 giúp \u0111\u1ee1 c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n, và xin chúc m\u1eebng.<\/p>

Trân tr\u1ecdng,<\/p>

Karel Authier<\/p>

T\u1ed5ng biên t\u1eadp<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
To: All Employees
From: Carmen Phelps, Central City Museum Director
Re: Special Exhibitions Curator
Date: November 15

To All Staff,

Please note that an advertisement will be placed in this Wednesday's newspaper regarding a new position at the Central City Museum. After the __(1)__ of Bloom Outside the Box, our recent exhibition showcasing the artwork of local sculptor Leanne Bloom, the museum board has deeded to allocate a new position dedicated to creating new quarterly exhibitions. The position title Is Special Exhibitions Curator. The successful applicant __(2)__ work on January 2.

__(3)__ Proven knowledge of local and regional artists is preferred. __(4)__ museum staff are encouraged to apply. Please contact Liliana Wells at extension 449 with questions.

Thank you.
Carmen
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1edbi: T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nhân viên<\/strong><\/p>

\u0110\u1ebfn: Carmen Phelps, Giám \u0111\u1ed1c B\u1ea3o tàng Thành ph\u1ed1 Trung tâm<\/strong><\/p>

Tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi: Ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 trách Tri\u1ec3n lãm \u0110\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t<\/strong><\/p>

Ngày: 15 tháng 11<\/strong><\/p>


<\/p>

G\u1eedi toàn th\u1ec3 nhân viên,<\/p>

Xin l\u01b0u ý m\u1ed9t qu\u1ea3ng cáo s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u0103ng trên báo vào th\u1ee9 T\u01b0 này liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn m\u1ed9t v\u1ecb trí m\u1edbi t\u1ea1i B\u1ea3o tàng Thành ph\u1ed1 Trung tâm. Sau s\u1ef1 n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng c\u1ee7a Bloom Outside the Box, tri\u1ec3n lãm g\u1ea7n \u0111ây c\u1ee7a chúng ta tr\u01b0ng bày các tác ph\u1ea9m ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt c\u1ee7a nhà \u0111iêu kh\u1eafc \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng Leanne Bloom, h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ed3ng b\u1ea3o tàng \u0111ã quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh phân b\u1ed5 m\u1ed9t v\u1ecb trí m\u1edbi dành riêng cho vi\u1ec7c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c các bu\u1ed5i tri\u1ec3n lãm m\u1edbi h\u1eb1ng quý. Ch\u1ee9c danh là Giám tuy\u1ec3n Tri\u1ec3n lãm \u0110\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t. \u1ee8ng viên trúng tuy\u1ec3n s\u1ebd b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u làm vi\u1ec7c vào ngày 2 tháng 1.<\/p>

V\u1ecb trí yêu c\u1ea7u kinh nghi\u1ec7m dày d\u1eb7n. \u01afu tiên ng\u01b0\u1eddi có ki\u1ebfn th\u1ee9c v\u1ec1 các ngh\u1ec7 s\u0129 \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng và khu v\u1ef1c \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ee9ng minh. Nhân viên b\u1ea3o tàng có trình \u0111\u1ed9 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c khuy\u1ebfn khích n\u1ed9p \u0111\u01a1n. Vui lòng liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi Liliana Wells theo s\u1ed1 máy l\u1ebb 449 n\u1ebfu có th\u1eafc m\u1eafc.<\/p>

C\u1ea3m \u01a1n các b\u1ea1n.<\/p>

Carmen<\/p>"}

parts.name: Reading comprehension
parts.title: In this part you will read a selection of texts, such as magezine and newspaper articles, letters, and advertisements. Each text is followed by several questions. Select the best answer for each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

Are you someone who enjoys trying new things and does not feel uncomfortable in new environment? Then why not get paid for it? CULTURE magazine is looking for individuals to go to ne

T\u1edbi: <Danh sách khách hàng><\/strong>
T\u1eeb: info@rapidrailways.com<\/strong>
Ngày: 1 tháng 2<\/strong>
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Tin t\u1ee9c<\/strong>
Rapid Railways mu\u1ed1n tri ân khách hàng thân thi\u1ebft v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t \u01b0u \u0111ãi gi\u1ea3m giá \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t cho các chuy\u1ebfn du l\u1ecbch trong tháng 4. Mua vé kh\u1ee9 h\u1ed3i dành cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi l\u1edbn trên $60 và \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi\u1ea3m 50% giá vé dành cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi l\u1edbn th\u1ee9 hai là ng\u01b0\u1eddi b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ed3ng hành. S\u1eed d\u1ee5ng mã RAIL khi \u0111\u1eb7t vé tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn.
Khuy\u1ebfn mãi này không áp d\u1ee5ng cho các chuy\u1ebfn tàu t\u1ed1c hành c\u1ee7a Rapid Railways. Khách hàng không th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ed5i vé \u0111ã mua tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó \u0111\u1ec3 l\u1ea5y \u01b0u \u0111ãi. Vé ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c mua tr\u01b0\u1edbc ngày 1 tháng 3.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"


Hãng s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t ô tô Harrod
Andrew Dunn, Giám \u0111\u1ed1c
Laura Bradley, Qu\u1ea3n lý khu v\u1ef1c
Chào m\u1eebng b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi hãng s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t ô tô Hairod! Chúng tôi nghiêm túc v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c duy trì m\u1ed9t môi tr\u01b0\u1eddng làm vi\u1ec7c an toàn. Chúng tôi yêu c\u1ea7u b\u1ea1n tuân th\u1ee7 nghiêm ng\u1eb7t các quy t\u1eafc sau \u0111ây khi b\u1ea1n tham quan t\u1ea7ng h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb. B\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 ai b\u1ecb phát hi\u1ec7n vi ph\u1ea1m các quy t\u1eafc này s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u r\u1eddi kh\u1ecfi c\u01a1 s\u1edf. N\u1ebfu có th\u1eafc m\u1eafc v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c tuân th\u1ee7, vui lòng liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi ng\u01b0\u1eddi qu\u1ea3n lý khu v\u1ef1c.
LUÔN LUÔN:
> \u0110i cùng v\u1edbi h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn viên.
> Mang kính b\u1ea3o h\u1ed9 và \u0111\u1ed9i m\u0169 b\u1ea3o hi\u1ec3m.
> Ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i các tín hi\u1ec7u báo \u0111\u1ed9ng và tuân theo h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn s\u01a1 tán.
> Xin phép h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn viên tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi ch\u1ee5p \u1ea3nh.
KHÔNG BAO GI\u1edc:
> R\u1eddi kh\u1ecfi nhóm.
> Vào các khu v\u1ef1c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ánh d\u1ea5u “Nguy hi\u1ec3m” ho\u1eb7c “Ch\u1ec9 dành cho nhân viên”.
> Thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb c\u1ea3m \u1ee9ng.<\/p>"}

{"vn":"

Scott Rabin (11:14 A.M.): Chào Tanya. Tôi \u0111ang \u1edf trong phòng ch\u1ee9a \u0111\u1ed3, d\u1ecdn s\u1ea1ch không gian theo yêu c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a Anita. Có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 h\u1ed9p \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ánh d\u1ea5u \"K\u1ebf toán\" \u1edf \u0111ây. Chúng có ph\u1ea3i c\u1ee7a cô không?
Tanya Greene (11:18 A.M.): Vâng, chúng có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 t\u1ec7p c\u0169 c\u1ee7a tôi trong \u0111ó. H\u1ea7u h\u1ebft chúng có th\u1ec3 c\u1eaft nh\u1ecf, nh\u01b0ng có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 chúng tôi có l\u1ebd c\u1ea7n gi\u1eef l\u1ea1i. Anh có mu\u1ed1n tôi \u0111\u1ebfn xem không? Tôi có kho\u1ea3ng 15 phút tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp ti\u1ebfp theo.
Scott Rabin (11:20 A.M.): Tùy cô. Tôi có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ec3 chúng \u1edf \u0111ây cho \u0111\u1ebfn khi cô có thêm th\u1eddi gian.
Tanya Greene (11:21 A.M.):Th\u1eadt tuy\u1ec7t. Tôi s\u1ebd dành m\u1ed9t chút th\u1eddi gian vào th\u1ee9 T\u01b0 \u0111\u1ec3 s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp chúng.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

NAIROBI (2 tháng 11) —Agosti, nhà bán l\u1ebb giày n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng c\u1ee7a Ý, s\u1ebd khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng c\u1eeda hàng \u0111\u1ea1i lý \u0111\u1ea7u tiên \u1edf \u0110ông Phi trong tu\u1ea7n này khi Agosti Nairobi m\u1edf c\u1eeda. Khách hàng s\u1ebd tìm th\u1ea5y t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các màu s\u1eafc t\u01b0\u01a1i sáng và thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111áo nh\u01b0 nh\u1eefng gì mà Agosti \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ebfn. - [1] -.
Agosti Nairobi s\u1ebd gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u m\u1ed9t cách ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn th\u1eddi trang th\u1ef1c t\u1ebf \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111áo, v\u1edbi các tr\u1ea1m hi\u1ec3n th\u1ecb trên màn hình c\u1ea3m \u1ee9ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t kh\u1eafp c\u1eeda hàng. - [2] -. Các tr\u1ea1m này s\u1ebd cho phép khách hàng xem qua thông tin s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m, \u0111\u1ecdc \u0111ánh giá c\u1ee7a khách \u0111ã mua và xác \u0111\u1ecbnh phong cách bán hàng t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t.
- [3] -. C\u1eeda hàng c\u0169ng s\u1ebd trang b\u1ecb c\u1ea3m bi\u1ebfn áp su\u1ea5t chân không. B\u1eb1ng cách \u0111\u1ee9ng trên c\u1ea3m bi\u1ebfn, khách hàng s\u1ebd xác \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ed1 \u0111o chân chính xác c\u1ee7a mình và ch\u1ecdn size giày phù h\u1ee3p nh\u1ea5t v\u1edbi chân c\u1ee7a mình. Giày s\u1ebd có s\u1eb5n v\u1edbi nhi\u1ec1u chi\u1ec1u dài và chi\u1ec1u r\u1ed9ng khác nhau mà không th\u01b0\u1eddng th\u1ea5y \u1edf các c\u1eeda hàng c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed1i th\u1ee7 c\u1ea1nh tranh.
Raffael Zito, giám \u0111\u1ed1c ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb c\u1ee7a Agosti cho bi\u1ebft: “Chúng tôi t\u1ea1i Agosti coi \u0110ông Phi là m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m quan tr\u1ecdng cho th\u1eddi trang m\u1edbi.\" Theo ông Zito, vi\u1ec7c khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng c\u1eeda hàng Nairobi ch\u1ec9 là b\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ea7y tham v\u1ecdng. - [4] -.<\/p>"}

{"vn":"

http:\/\/www.pinecrestofficepark.com\/requestform;
Khu cao \u1ed1c v\u0103n phòng Pinecrest
Bi\u1ec3u m\u1eabu yêu c\u1ea7u
Judy Blanch, Giám \u0111\u1ed1c v\u0103n phòng
215555.0118, máy l\u1ebb 2
Ngày yêu c\u1ea7u: ngày 2 tháng 4
Ng\u01b0\u1eddi thuê: Lerner và Randall, LLC
V\u0103n phòng: C\u0103n B, T\u1ea7ng 3
Tên liên h\u1ec7 c\u1ee7a ng\u01b0\u1eddi thuê: Amy Randall
V\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1:
H\u1ea1 t\u1ea7ng: \u2611
\u0110i\u1ec7n: \u2610
H\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng \u1ed1ng n\u01b0\u1edbc \u2610
Mô t\u1ea3 ng\u1eafn g\u1ecdn v\u1ec1 công vi\u1ec7c c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft:
Tr\u1ea7n nhà phía trên c\u1eeda s\u1ed5 \u0111ã b\u1ecb rò r\u1ec9 n\u01b0\u1edbc và t\u01b0\u1eddng b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u ng\u1ea3 màu.
H\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn b\u1ed5 sung:
Tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi \u0111\u1ebfn, vui lòng g\u1ecdi \u0111i\u1ec7n cho v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a tôi theo s\u1ed1 215.555.0127. Ch\u1ed3ng tôi, Zach Lerner, và tôi mu\u1ed1n có m\u1eb7t khi nhân viên tòa nhà \u1edf \u0111ó. Có thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb v\u0103n phòng r\u1ea5t \u0111\u1eaft ti\u1ec1n ngay d\u01b0\u1edbi ph\u1ea7n \u0111ó c\u1ee7a tr\u1ea7n nhà. Chúng tôi s\u1ebd c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i di chuy\u1ec3n nó tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa.
\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111i\u1ec1n b\u1edfi Qu\u1ea3n lý Pinecrest:
Ngày nh\u1eadn: 3 tháng 4
\u0110ã giao cho: ln-Su Kim
Phê duy\u1ec7t: Có \u2611 Không \u2610
Ng\u01b0\u1eddi ch\u1ea5p thu\u1eadn: Judy Blanch
Ghi chú:
Vui lòng ki\u1ec3m tra v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 này vào sáng s\u1edbm ngày mai sau khi b\u1ea1n g\u1ecdi cho bà Randall. N\u1ebfu c\u1ea7n s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa mái nhà, hãy g\u1eedi e-mail cho John Roper (Roper Roofers ~ john@roperroofers.com), và s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c h\u1eb9n \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u01b0\u1edbc tính.<\/p>"}

{"vn":"

\u0110\u1ec2 \u0110\u01af\u1ee2C PHÁT HÀNH NGAY L\u1eacP T\u1ee8C<\/strong>
Liên h\u1ec7 truy\u1ec1n thông: Andrea Oladéttir \/ +613 555 0124<\/strong>
Babson Xe Ltd. nhi\u1ec7t tình tri\u1ec3n khai s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a Deluxident<\/strong><\/p>

OTTAWA (10 tháng 6) —Babson Vehicles Ltd, m\u1ed9t hãng s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t hàng \u0111\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a Canada, v\u1eeba áp d\u1ee5ng h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng nh\u1eadp d\u1ea5u vân tay m\u1edbi nh\u1eb1m c\u1ea3i thi\u1ec7n tính b\u1ea3o m\u1eadt c\u1ee7a công ty. \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c công ty Deluxident c\u1ee7a Iceland ch\u1ebf t\u1ea1o, h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng này cho phép nhân viên vào các tòa nhà trong khuôn viên b\u1eb1ng cách quét d\u1ea5u vân tay.
Theo Giám \u0111\u1ed1c \u0111i\u1ec1u hành Daniel Deems c\u1ee7a Babson, h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng quét vân tay c\u1ee7a Deluxident là m\u1ed9t c\u1ea3i ti\u1ebfn \u0111áng k\u1ec3 so v\u1edbi các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m b\u1ea3o m\u1eadt khác mà công ty \u0111ã th\u1eed trong quá kh\u1ee9.
“Máy quét d\u1ea5u vân tay c\u1ee7a Deluxident là m\u1ed9t tài s\u1ea3n to l\u1edbn. Tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây, chúng tôi luôn vào các tòa nhà c\u1ee7a mình b\u1eb1ng cách s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng các phù hi\u1ec7u nh\u1eadn d\u1ea1ng \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed và \u1ea3nh, ”Deems nói. “Tuy nhiên, vi\u1ec7c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t và thay th\u1ebf các phù hi\u1ec7u b\u1ecb m\u1ea5t r\u1ea5t t\u1ed1n kém. Ngoài ra, chúng còn gây ra m\u1ed9t m\u1ed1i \u0111e d\u1ecda an ninh \u0111áng k\u1ec3. Nhân viên \u0111ôi khi quên phù hi\u1ec7u c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd, thêm c\u1ea3 vi\u1ec7c ph\u1ea3i qua l\u1ea1i v\u0103n phòng an ninh c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Nói chung, các phù hi\u1ec7u r\u1ea5t t\u1ed1n kém và r\u1ee7i ro. \"
Trong th\u1eadp k\u1ef7 qua, Deluxident \u0111ã cung c\u1ea5p các gi\u1ea3i pháp công ngh\u1ec7 cao t\u1ea1i n\u01a1i làm vi\u1ec7c v\u1edbi các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt s\u1ed1 sáng t\u1ea1o c\u1ee7a mình. Tr\u1ee5 s\u1edf chính t\u1ea1i Reykjavik, Deluxident cung c\u1ea5p các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m trên toàn th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi và cung c\u1ea5p h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt 24 gi\u1edd qua \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i. \u0110\u1ec3 bi\u1ebft thêm chi ti\u1ebft v\u1ec1 h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng nh\u1eadp quét vân tay m\u1edbi, hãy truy c\u1eadp www.deluxident.is.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Maria Cleary
Z289 Ph\u1ed1 Coolidge
Great Falls, MT 59401<\/p>

Paul Donnell
5267 Cotton Vale
Helena, MT 59624<\/p>

Ông Donnell thân m\u1ebfn,
Sau khi tìm ki\u1ebfm h\u1ed3 s\u01a1 thu\u1ebf tài s\u1ea3n công c\u1ee7a Lewis và Clark Country tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn, tôi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ebft ông là ch\u1ee7 tòa nhà, n\u01a1i t\u1eebng là m\u1ed9t c\u1eeda hàng t\u1ed5ng h\u1ee3p \u1edf góc \u0110\u1ea1i l\u1ed9 Waller và Ph\u1ed1 Main. Theo tôi th\u1ea5y, tòa nhà \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bít kín và không có ng\u01b0\u1eddi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng trong vài n\u0103m. - [1] -. Tôi mu\u1ed1n bi\u1ebft li\u1ec7u b\u1ea1n có mu\u1ed1n bán nó không.
Tôi \u0111ã d\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ecbnh m\u1edf m\u1ed9t quán cà phê trong khu v\u1ef1c và tôi tin r\u1eb1ng v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 c\u1ea3i ti\u1ebfn khiêm t\u1ed1n, tòa nhà c\u1ee7a ông có th\u1ec3 là m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m hoàn h\u1ea3o. Tôi mu\u1ed1n gi\u1eef nguyên c\u1ea5u trúc ban \u0111\u1ea7u càng nhi\u1ec1u càng t\u1ed1t. - [2] -. B\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 s\u1eeda \u0111\u1ed5i nào s\u1ebd r\u1ea5t nh\u1ecf.
Tôi nh\u1eadn th\u1ea5y có nh\u1eefng tòa nhà khác \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c rao bán trong khu kinh doanh, nh\u01b0ng chúng không có k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i v\u1edbi c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng t\u01b0\u01a1ng t\u1ef1. - [3] -. Tôi \u0111ã nói chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi nhi\u1ec1u c\u01b0 dân c\u1ee7a Helena, nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi có nh\u1eefng k\u1ef7 ni\u1ec7m \u0111\u1eb9p \u0111\u1ebd v\u1ec1 tòa nhà, và h\u1ecd mu\u1ed1n th\u1ea5y nó \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ed5i thành m\u1ed9t c\u1ea5u trúc có th\u1ec3 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n n\u1eefa. - [4]-. Tôi t\u1ef1 tin r\u1eb1ng k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch c\u1ee7a mình s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng hoan nghênh.
C\u1ea3m \u01a1n ông \u0111ã xem xét \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb c\u1ee7a tôi. N\u1ebfu ông mu\u1ed1n th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn chi ti\u1ebft, có th\u1ec3 liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi tôi theo s\u1ed1 4065550181.
Trân tr\u1ecdng,
Maria Cleary<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Các b\u1ea3ng thông báo t\u1ea1i Qu\u1ea3ng cáo Quenten<\/strong><\/p>

Các b\u1ea3ng thông báo v\u1eadt lý trong các khoa c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c giám sát b\u1edfi tr\u1ee3 lý hành chính t\u1ea1i Phòng Nhân s\u1ef1. Các b\u1ea3ng thông báo \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t trong t\u1ee7 kính có khóa, và tr\u1ee3 lý hành chính ch\u1ecbu trách nhi\u1ec7m gi\u1eef chìa khóa t\u1ee7 và \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o r\u1eb1ng t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các tin \u0111\u0103ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt.
- B\u1ea3ng thông báo c\u1ee7a thang máy \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng \u0111\u1ec3 truy\u1ec1n t\u1ea3i thông tin chung \u0111\u1ebfn toàn th\u1ec3 nhân viên, ch\u1eb3ng h\u1ea1n nh\u01b0 tin t\u1ee9c quan tr\u1ecdng c\u1ee7a công ty ho\u1eb7c các thông báo nh\u1eafc nh\u1edf.
- B\u1ea3ng thông báo bên ngoài các phòng h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng cho các thông tin liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn các cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp s\u1eafp t\u1edbi và các s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c lên l\u1ecbch cho các phòng \u0111ó.
- B\u1ea3ng thông báo \u1edf phòng ch\u1edd nhân viên có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng cho các thông báo không \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c Qu\u1ea3ng cáo Quenten tài tr\u1ee3 có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ed3ng nghi\u1ec7p quan tâm chung, ch\u1eb3ng h\u1ea1n nh\u01b0 các m\u1eb7t hàng cá nhân \u0111\u1ec3 bán, l\u1ec5 h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng và các s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng khác. \u0110\u1ec3 \u0111\u0103ng các thông báo này, tr\u01b0\u1edbc tiên, nhân viên ph\u1ea3i g\u1eedi yêu c\u1ea7u \u0111\u1ebfn Phòng Nhân s\u1ef1 và bao g\u1ed3m Thông tin liên h\u1ec7 c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 b\u1ea3n sao c\u1ee7a tin \u0111\u0103ng. Nh\u1eefng thông báo này không \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u0103ng h\u01a1n hai tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc ngày di\u1ec5n ra s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n.
T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các b\u1ea3ng thông báo s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ki\u1ec3m tra th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o tuân th\u1ee7 các m\u1ee5c \u0111ích \u0111ã \u0111\u1ecbnh.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

*Trò chuy\u1ec7n tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp*
Satoru Hashimoto (10:42 SA):<\/strong> Tôi v\u1eeba \u0111\u0103ng nh\u1eadp vào tài kho\u1ea3n ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình khách hàng thân thi\u1ebft c\u1ee7a mình và th\u1ea5y r\u1eb1ng nh\u1eefng \u0111êm tôi l\u01b0u trú t\u1ea1i khách s\u1ea1n Grand Jurong vào tháng tr\u01b0\u1edbc ch\u01b0a \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ghi l\u1ea1i. \u0110i\u1ec3m khách hàng thân thi\u1ebft c\u1ee7a tôi có \u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x\u1eed lý không?
Franca Russo (10:44 SA):<\/strong> C\u1ea3m \u01a1n ông \u0111ã liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi Trung tâm ch\u0103m sóc khách hàng. Tôi \u0111ang xem tài kho\u1ea3n c\u1ee7a ông và th\u1ea5y r\u1eb1ng \u0111i\u1ec3m khách hàng thân thi\u1ebft hi\u1ec7n không có \u1edf \u0111ó. \u0110i\u1ec3m có giá tr\u1ecb trong m\u1ed9t n\u0103m sau ngày tr\u1ea3 phòng. Tôi \u0111ang thêm ông Han Sai Wong t\u1eeb Grand Jurong vào cu\u1ed9c trò chuy\u1ec7n này \u0111\u1ec3 xác nh\u1eadn vi\u1ec7c anh l\u01b0u trú t\u1ea1i khách s\u1ea1n. Ông \u0111ã l\u01b0u trú vào nh\u1eefng ngày nào \u0111\u1ec3 anh \u1ea5y có th\u1ec3 ki\u1ec3m tra \u0111\u1eb7t phòng?
Han Sai Wong (10:46 SA):<\/strong> \u0110ã có r\u1ed3i. Tôi có th\u1ec3 xác nh\u1eadn ông Hashimoto \u0111ã \u1edf l\u1ea1i 4 \u0111êm v\u1edbi ngày nh\u1eadn phòng là ngày 7 tháng 3.
Satoru Hashimoto (10:47 SA):<\/strong> Ngày 7 tháng 3 \u0111\u1ebfn ngày 11 tháng 3.
Franca Russo (10:50 SA):<\/strong> Ông Hashimoto, tôi \u0111ã thêm \u0111i\u1ec3m vào tài kho\u1ea3n c\u1ee7a ông. V\u1edbi s\u1ed1 \u0111i\u1ec3m m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a mình, ông \u0111\u1ee7 \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ec3 nâng c\u1ea5p phòng c\u1ee7a mình cho \u0111\u1ee3t l\u01b0u trú ông \u0111\u1eb7t vào tháng t\u1edbi ho\u1eb7c ông có th\u1ec3 áp d\u1ee5ng s\u1ed1 \u0111i\u1ec3m cho m\u1ed9t \u0111êm mi\u1ec5n phí khi \u0111\u1eb7t phòng trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai. Tôi có th\u1ec3 h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 ông trong vi\u1ec7c nâng c\u1ea5p \u0111\u1eb7t phòng hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a ông ho\u1eb7c hoàn thành \u0111\u1eb7t phòng cho m\u1ed9t k\u1ef3 ngh\u1ec9 trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai không?
Satoru Hashimoto (10:51 SA):<\/strong> Không ph\u1ea3i lúc này. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n s\u1ef1 giúp \u0111\u1ee1 c\u1ee7a cô!<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1edbi: Munahid Awad
T\u1eeb: Abby Fordyce
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Thông tin
Ngày: 2 tháng 2
\u0110ính kèm: S\u1ed5 tay<\/p>

Kính g\u1eedi ông Awad,
Bu\u1ed5i sáng t\u1ed1t lành. Tôi hy v\u1ecdng ngày \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a ông t\u1ea1i Hãng cung c\u1ea5p v\u1eadt t\u01b0 Y t\u1ebf Epmedin s\u1ebd di\u1ec5n ra t\u1ed1t \u0111\u1eb9p.
Vui lòng tìm thông tin chi ti\u1ebft v\u1ec1 các chính sách và quy \u0111\u1ecbnh vi\u1ec7c làm c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111ính kèm. Nhân ti\u1ec7n, ông \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ecbnh ch\u1ed7 \u0111\u1eadu xe cá nhân c\u1ee7a mình, nh\u01b0ng ông s\u1ebd c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn \u0111i\u1ec1u hành v\u1eadn t\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ec3 xin gi\u1ea5y phép \u0111\u1eadu xe cho m\u1ee5c \u0111ích tr\u01b0ng bày.
Nh\u01b0 chúng ta \u0111ã th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn vào tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc, chúng tôi c\u1ea7n s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp vi\u1ec7c \u0111i l\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ec3 ông \u0111\u1ebfn th\u0103m các c\u01a1 s\u1edf khác c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a ông s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn tr\u1ee5 s\u1edf chính c\u1ee7a chúng tôi vào tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi, sau \u0111ó là chuy\u1ebfn th\u0103m các c\u01a1 s\u1edf còn l\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a chúng tôi vào cu\u1ed1i tháng. Wendy Leighton s\u1ebd h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 ông \u0111\u1eb7t phòng và có th\u1ec3 liên h\u1ec7 t\u1ea1i wleighton@epmedin.co.uk.
Vui lòng cho tôi bi\u1ebft n\u1ebfu ông c\u1ea7n b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 \u0111i\u1ec1u gì khác.
Trân tr\u1ecdng,
Abby<\/p>

*S\u1ed5 tay*
Hãng cung c\u1ea5p v\u1eadt t\u01b0 y t\u1ebf Epmedin
S\u1ed5 tay nhân viên
Quy t\u1eafc trang ph\u1ee5c
Quy \u0111\u1ecbnh v\u1ec1 trang ph\u1ee5c n\u01a1i làm vi\u1ec7c khác nhau tùy theo v\u1ecb trí. Tr\u1ee5 s\u1edf chính \u1edf London và v\u0103n phòng Glasgow yêu c\u1ea7u nhân viên m\u1eb7c trang ph\u1ee5c công s\u1edf trang tr\u1ecdng, trong khi trang ph\u1ee5c công s\u1edf không trang trong \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ea5p thu\u1eadn cho nhân viên t\u1ea1i các nhà máy s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t \u1edf Dublin và Belfast. Trang ph\u1ee5c công s\u1edf trang tr\u1ecdng là b\u1ed9 vest công s\u1edf, bao g\u1ed3m áo khoác, qu\u1ea7n âu ho\u1eb7c váy \u0111\u1ea7m và cà v\u1ea1t (\u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi nam). Trang ph\u1ee5c công s\u1edf không trang tr\u1ecdng là qu\u1ea7n tây ho\u1eb7c qu\u1ea7n âu, áo s\u01a1 mi ho\u1eb7c áo cánh, ho\u1eb7c váy li\u1ec1n thân ho\u1eb7c chân váy.
Ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ti\u1ec7n \u0111i l\u1ea1i
Bãi \u0111\u1eadu xe t\u1ea1i v\u0103n phòng London \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c dành cho xe giao hàng và xe an ninh. Th\u1ebb \u0111i xe buýt và tàu h\u1ecfa hàng tháng có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c mua thông qua b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn Nhân s\u1ef1 v\u1edbi giá b\u1eb1ng m\u1ed9t n\u1eeda giá vé thông th\u01b0\u1eddng.
Do h\u1ea1n ch\u1ebf v\u1ec1 ch\u1ed7 \u0111\u1eadu xe t\u1ea1i ch\u1ed7 t\u1ea1i các c\u01a1 s\u1edf s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t \u1edf Glasgow và Dublin, nhân viên có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1eadu xe mi\u1ec5n phí t\u1ea1i các nhà \u0111\u1ec3 xe \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ecbnh. Nhân viên c\u1ea7n có gi\u1ea5y phép, có th\u1ec3 xin gi\u1ea5y phép thông qua b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn \u0111i\u1ec1u hành v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n. Gi\u1ea5y phép ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gia h\u1ea1n h\u1eb1ng n\u0103m tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn.
Nhân viên t\u1ea1i c\u01a1 s\u1edf Belfast ph\u1ea3i có gi\u1ea5y phép cho m\u1ed9t ch\u1ed7 \u0111\u1eadu xe \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ecbnh t\u1eeb b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn \u0111i\u1ec1u hành v\u1eadn t\u1ea3i.<\/p>"}

Your first trip will be to our headquarters next week, followed by visits to the rest of our facilities at the end of the month.<\/p>","en":"

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

*E-mail*<\/strong><\/p>

\u0110\u1ebfn: \u0110\u1ed9i qu\u1ea3n lý<\/p>

T\u1eeb: Fiona Watson<\/p>

Ngày: 19 tháng 3<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp mùa xuân<\/p>

\u0110ính kèm: Ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình cu\u1ed1i cùng<\/p>

\u0110\u1ed3ng nghi\u1ec7p thân m\u1ebfn,<\/p>

\u0110ây là l\u1eddi nh\u1eafc nh\u1edf r\u1eb1ng cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp qu\u1ea3n lý mùa xuân c\u1ee7a T\u1eadp \u0111oàn Contiera \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c lên l\u1ecbch vào 9 gi\u1edd sáng ngày mai. Ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình cu\u1ed1i cùng \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ính kèm. Xin l\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng tôi \u0111ã thêm m\u1ed9t m\u1ee5c vào ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình h\u1ecdp ban \u0111\u1ea7u. Mai Tr\u1ea7n, ng\u01b0\u1eddi giám sát \u1ea5n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a chúng ta mu\u1ed1n c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt cho m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi bi\u1ebft v\u1ec1 dòng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a mùa này. Cô \u1ea5y s\u1ebd không dành m\u1ea5t quá hai m\u01b0\u01a1i phút.<\/p>

\u0110\u1ec3 chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb cho cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp, vui lòng xem l\u1ea1i k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb g\u1ea7n \u0111ây nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a chúng ta \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 chúng ta có ý t\u01b0\u1edfng rõ ràng v\u1ec1 m\u1ee5c tiêu c\u1ee7a mình trong quý. Nó c\u0169ng s\u1ebd h\u1eefu ích n\u1ebfu m\u1ed7i ng\u01b0\u1eddi trong s\u1ed1 các b\u1ea1n mang theo b\u1ea3n sao báo cáo ngân sách m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t và các b\u1ea3n kê khai chi phí d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn cho quý t\u1edbi.<\/p>

Tôi mong \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eb7p các b\u1ea1n vào ngày mai.<\/p>

Fiona Watson<\/p>

 <\/p>

Cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp qu\u1ea3n lý mùa xuân — Ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình cu\u1ed1i cùng<\/strong><\/p>

Ngày và gi\u1edd:<\/strong> 20 tháng 3, 9 gi\u1edd sáng<\/p>

\u0110\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m:<\/strong> Phòng H\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o 2<\/p>

\u0110\u1ec1 tài<\/strong><\/p><\/td>

Mô t\u1ea3<\/strong><\/p><\/td>

Tr\u01b0\u1edfng nhóm<\/strong><\/p><\/td><\/tr>

Các s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng<\/p><\/td>

- Tìm hi\u1ec3u v\u1ec1 các c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng<\/p><\/td>

Paul Ranier, ch\u1ee7 t\u1ecbch Hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i Doanh nghi\u1ec7p Arborville<\/p><\/td><\/tr>

Xem xét ngân sách<\/p><\/td>

- Th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 ngân sách b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn<\/p><\/td>

Fiona Watson<\/p><\/td><\/tr>

Qu\u1ea3ng cáo tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn<\/p><\/td>

- Xem xét chi phí c\u1ee7a vi\u1ec7c qu\u1ea3ng cáo trên Web<\/p>

- Phân tích các l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c \u0111\u1ec3 t\u0103ng tr\u01b0\u1edfng<\/p><\/td>

Marcia Dover<\/p><\/td><\/tr>

C\u1eadp nh\u1eadt trang web<\/p><\/td>

- Trình bày nh\u1eefng thay \u0111\u1ed5i g\u1ea7n \u0111ây \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi trang qu\u1ea7n áo tr\u01b0\u1ee3t tuy\u1ebft<\/p>

- Trình di\u1ec5n ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m qu\u1ea3n lý n\u1ed9i dung m\u1edbi<\/p><\/td>

Barry Callahan<\/p>

 <\/p><\/td><\/tr>

In \u1ea5n ph\u1ea9m<\/p><\/td>

- Xem l\u1ea1i nh\u1eefng thay \u0111\u1ed5i cu\u1ed1i cùng \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi danh m\u1ee5c trang ph\u1ee5c th\u1ec3 thao mùa xuân<\/p><\/td>

Mai Tr\u1ea7n<\/p><\/td><\/tr><\/tbody><\/table>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Liên hoan phim tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i x\u1ee9 Wales<\/strong><\/p>

SWANSEA (24 tháng 5) —Liên hoan phim Penglais tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i thành ph\u1ed1 v\u1edbi nhi\u1ec1u b\u1ed9 phim m\u1edbi thú v\u1ecb. L\u1ec5 h\u1ed9i \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf công nh\u1eadn v\u1ec1 nh\u1eefng tài n\u0103ng mà liên hoan phim \u0111ã thu hút \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trong nh\u1eefng n\u0103m qua. Liên hoan phim c\u0169ng t\u1ef1 hào \u0111ã m\u1edf ra s\u1ef1 nghi\u1ec7p c\u1ee7a m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng l\u1edbn các nhà làm phim n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng.<\/p>

Liên hoan phim kéo dài trong m\u1ed9t tu\u1ea7n t\u1eeb ngày 9 \u0111\u1ebfn ngày 15 tháng 8 và s\u1ebd công chi\u1ebfu các b\u1ed9 phim ho\u1ea1t hình, phim tài li\u1ec7u và các phim truy\u1ec7n tiêu bi\u1ec3u. Liên hoan phim m\u1edf c\u1eeda cho công chúng, ngo\u1ea1i tr\u1eeb s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n b\u1ebf m\u1ea1c vào ngày 15 tháng 8, ch\u1ec9 có khách \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1eddi. Vé cho t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n dành cho công chúng ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c mua tr\u01b0\u1edbc và d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn s\u1ebd bán h\u1ebft nhanh chóng.<\/p>

Vi\u1ec7c bán vé s\u1ebd b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u lúc 10 gi\u1edd sáng vào ngày 3 tháng 6. Xin l\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng vé cho các bu\u1ed5i chi\u1ebfu phim l\u1ebb ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c mua riêng.<\/p>

L\u1ecbch trình chi\u1ebfu \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 hi\u1ec7n \u0111ã có trên trang web c\u1ee7a l\u1ec5 h\u1ed9i t\u1ea1i www.penglaisfest.co.uk.<\/p>

 <\/p>

*E-mail*<\/strong><\/p>

\u0110\u1ebfn: Desmond Griffith<\/p>

T\u1eeb: Ioan Driscoll<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Re: L\u1ec5 trao gi\u1ea3i Penglais<\/p>

Ngày: 28 tháng 5<\/p>

Kính g\u1eedi ông Griffith,<\/p>

Tôi r\u1ea5t vui và vinh d\u1ef1 khi bi\u1ebft r\u1eb1ng ông có th\u1ec3 \u0111ích thân nh\u1eadn gi\u1ea3i th\u01b0\u1edfng t\u1ea1i L\u1ec5 trao gi\u1ea3i Penglais n\u0103m nay. Bu\u1ed5i l\u1ec5 s\u1ebd di\u1ec5n ra t\u1ea1i khách s\u1ea1n Wynford Blue lúc 5 gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u vào th\u1ee9 Sáu, ngày 15 tháng 8. Ông s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ee7 t\u1ecbch liên hoan phim, bà Sarah Wu, gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u và ông s\u1ebd có c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i phát bi\u1ec3u. Chúng tôi thi\u1ec7n chí \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb ông gi\u1edbi h\u1ea1n bài phát bi\u1ec3u này dài không quá 10 phút.<\/p>

Vui lòng cung c\u1ea5p cho tôi \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 e-mail c\u1ee7a t\u1ed1i \u0111a n\u0103m v\u1ecb khách mà ông mu\u1ed1n m\u1eddi \u0111\u1ebfn bu\u1ed5i l\u1ec5. Tôi ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn s\u1ebd g\u1eedi cho m\u1ed7i ng\u01b0\u1eddi m\u1ed9t liên k\u1ebft \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ea3i xu\u1ed1ng vé \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd trong vòng m\u01b0\u1eddi ngày k\u1ec3 t\u1eeb ngày di\u1ec5n ra s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n.<\/p>

Xin chúc m\u1eebng,<\/p>

Ioan Driscoll<\/p>

Ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n<\/strong><\/p>

L\u1ec5 trao gi\u1ea3i Liên hoan phim Penglais h\u1eb1ng n\u0103m l\u1ea7n th\u1ee9 25<\/strong><\/p><\/td><\/tr>

Ph\u1ea7n trình di\u1ec5n c\u1ee7a Shirley Finch, cùng v\u1edbi Dom Lucas \u0111ánh d\u01b0\u01a1ng c\u1ea7m<\/p>

Tr\u1ea3o gi\u1ea3i Di\u1ec5n xu\u1ea5t xu\u1ea5t s\u1eafc<\/p>

Bài phát bi\u1ec3u c\u1ee7a Ng\u01b0\u1eddi nh\u1eadn Gi\u1ea3i th\u01b0\u1edfng Thành t\u1ef1u Tr\u1ecdn \u0111\u1eddi<\/p>

L\u1eddi c\u1ea3m \u01a1n và l\u1eddi ng\u1ecf<\/p>

It also boasts of having launched the careers of a growing number of celebrity filmmakers.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

*E-mail*
\u0110\u1ebfn: a.raman@bgi.co.in
T\u1eeb: s.kapoor@imail.co.in
Ngày: 15 tháng 4
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Th\u01b0 c\u1ea3m \u01a1n
Ông Raman thân m\u1ebfn,
C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã khuy\u1ebfn khích tôi \u1ee9ng tuy\u1ec3n vào v\u1ecb trí t\u1ea1i Qu\u1ea3ng cáo Neela và \u0111ã thay m\u1eb7t tôi vi\u1ebft m\u1ed9t l\u1eddi gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u h\u1ea5p d\u1eabn nh\u01b0 v\u1eady.
Ông Nirmal, giám \u0111\u1ed1c tuy\u1ec3n d\u1ee5ng c\u1ee7a Neela, bày t\u1ecf s\u1ef1 ng\u01b0\u1ee1ng m\u1ed9 \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi Qu\u1ea3ng cáo truy\u1ec1n hình mà tôi \u0111ã s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t cho Delhi Works, nh\u01b0ng ông \u1ea5y gi\u1ea3i thích r\u1eb1ng trên th\u1ef1c t\u1ebf công ty c\u1ee7a ông c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi c\u0169ng có th\u1ec3 t\u1ea1o n\u1ed9i dung và \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng web. Do \u0111ó, tôi \u0111ã không \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb v\u1ecb trí này.
Vui lòng cho tôi bi\u1ebft n\u1ebfu ông tình c\u1edd bi\u1ebft b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 v\u1ecb trí nào khác có th\u1ec3 phù h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi tôi. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n ông tr\u01b0\u1edbc.
Trân tr\u1ecdng.
Shreya<\/p>

*E-mail*
17 tháng 5
Shreya Kapoor
Zl Hammam Strcct
Mumbai
Kính g\u1eedi bà Kapoor,
Tôi r\u1ea5t vui vì cô s\u1ebd gia nh\u1eadp Mumbai Canning Ltd. vào ngày 1 tháng 6. Tôi r\u1ea5t \u1ea5n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng v\u1edbi ki\u1ebfn th\u1ee9c mà cô th\u1ec3 hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m cô ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n t\u1ea1i v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Kinh nghi\u1ec7m c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3 c\u1ee7a cô t\u1ea1i Delhi Works, Inc., s\u1ebd có giá tr\u1ecb to l\u1edbn \u1edf \u0111ây.
Tôi g\u1eedi kèm theo m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 gi\u1ea5y t\u1edd mà cô nên hoàn thành, ký tên và mang theo khi báo cáo v\u1edbi B\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn Nhân s\u1ef1 lúc 9:30 sáng vào ngày \u0111\u1ea7u \u0111i làm. Cô s\u1ebd nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ecbnh h\u01b0\u1edbng hành chính ng\u1eafn g\u1ecdn vào hôm \u0111ó. Ng\u01b0\u1eddi c\u1ed1 v\u1ea5n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ecbnh c\u1ee7a cô, bà Meera Sethi, s\u1ebd g\u1eb7p cô \u1edf \u0111ó lúc 10:30 \u0111\u1ec3 d\u1eabn cô \u0111\u1ebfn b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn làm vi\u1ec7c, n\u01a1i bà \u1ea5y s\u1ebd xem xét k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch \u0111ào t\u1ea1o c\u1ee7a cô và các d\u1ef1 án mà nhóm hi\u1ec7n \u0111ang th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n. Vào bu\u1ed5i tr\u01b0a, bà \u1ea5y s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0a cô \u0111\u1ebfn nhà \u0103n c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111\u1ec3 \u0103n tr\u01b0acùng m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 \u0111\u1ed3ng nghi\u1ec7p trong công ty. Tôi hy v\u1ecdng s\u1ebd \u0103n cùng cô \u1edf \u0111ó.
Chào m\u1eebng \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi Mumbai Canning Ltd.!
Trân tr\u1ecdng,
Zara Mehta
Mumbai Canning Ltd.<\/p>

T\u1edbi: a.raman@bgi.co.in
T\u1eeb: s.kapoor@imail.co.in
Ngày: 20 tháng 5
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Tin t\u1ed1t
Ông Raman thân m\u1ebfn,
C\u1ea3m \u01a1n l\u1eddi gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u c\u1ee7a ông m\u1edbi \u0111ây. Giám \u0111\u1ed1c \u0111ã \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb tôi m\u1ed9t v\u1ecb trí sau bu\u1ed5i ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n và tôi s\u1ebd b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u làm vi\u1ec7c vào ngày 1 tháng 6. Tôi s\u1ebd r\u1ea5t vui lòng cho ông bi\u1ebft thông tin chi ti\u1ebft v\u1ec1 công vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a tôi khi \u0111ã \u1ed5n \u0111\u1ecbnh.
Chúc m\u1ecdi \u0111i\u1ec1u t\u1ed1t lành,
Shreya<\/p>"}
